name: Eliza Collier
text: Very Rude Customer Service!!...The woman UPS employee there today yelled RUDELY at everyone saying there should only be 7 people waiting in line(there was 6 she admitted) after making others go outside. But that’s not the worst part...she refused to help process people’s returns at the empty computer station while the line proceeded to get 12 people deep outside down the sidewalk....leaving only one employee taking everyone’s returns because she refused to help. Very Rude & Stressful environment!

resp.text:
I do apologize and will discuss this with her.  Looking at the video I believe she was trying to clear some of the packages from the area as it was getting too congested given the run of people they saw during that period.  In between that period she was helping customers at the other computer.  I will discuss this with her, She should have let you and the other customers know what she was doing, such as "I need to clear the area and will get back to everyone as quickly as possible."
Thank You,
Larry

name: M
text:
I have to say that I am extremely disappointed with how this location is handling the COVID safety of its patrons. I went in yesterday to drop off a package. They were swamped and it was a 45 minute wait. The wait was not the issue. It's December and I expected there to be a wait. The issue was that there was no social distancing encouraged in the small lobby space! There were 13 people crammed in a small area at one point + employees. There was one employee not wearing a mask at all. She kept walking around in the front area and making trips out the front door through the crowds of people. Another had on a 3" chin visor mask, that let's be honest, wasn't protecting anyone. As someone that is high-risk and being very careful about being around people, this was an incredibly uncomfortable (but unfortunately necessary) trip to the UPS store for me.  The gentleman behind me also expressed how uncomfortable he was with the thought of having to step inside the lobby with so many people. In fact, we both hung back and allowed people to filter out before going inside, only to have many more people cram in behind us just moments after we walked in.

We've been at this pandemic thing for months. Concern for safety is not new. Why was there no one at this location telling people, "So sorry guys, only 5 allowed inside at a time so we can keep everyone safe."  Not to mention the fact the if I have to wear my mask to enter the building, WHY are employees not required to wear proper masks as well?

resp.text:
I am sorry that you had a bad experience.  We have signage on the door requesting our customers to maintain social distancing while in the store as well as placards on the floor spaced ~6 ft apart to aid in the effort to maintain social distancing.  We had hoped that these aids would have been sufficient for our customers to self police.  During the remainder of the holiday season and as needed we will begin having someone at the door to help our customers to maintain the proper social distancing during our busiest periods.  I will review our store video to see which of the employees did not have a mask on and take the appropriate actions.

Thank You and I do Apologize
Larry Stephens

name: PAB “Kelfer” Brown
text: Absolutely RUDE!   Went in to have a 1 page document notarized, called the day before to confirm a notary would be there, we were told the employees name and she would be in.  Upon arrival that employee was up front and said she was busy and was the only one working and we would have to wait, (just to note when we first walked in we were the only customers) but OK. A few customers did come in for shipping, we waited.  Another woman came out from the back and told us there was no time and we would have to come back tomorrow, we said we would just await until there was time and she said NO we had to come back, I said the other employee asked us to just wait...the woman who said NO was described as the "owner" and handled the situation in an extremely rude manner.  the apparent owner said this has to be done by appointment I told her I did call yesterday and was told the notary was working...that didn't matter.  No where on website does it state this service is "by appointment". We were not in a rush and were willing to wait for the shipping customers to be dealt with first.  We had a one page document, literally took another notary in the area 7 minutes time.   POOR BUSINESS model to treat customers so rudely.

resp.text:
Sorry for the bad experience on Sunday.  We do only have one person working Sundays after the first hour or two there is not much activity.  Because of the one person and that some notaries can take a good amount of time we do ask our employees not to refer any notaries to the Sunday person but we did and we should have honored that when you came in.  Especially since yours was an easy one.  I am sorry and have spoken to those involved.  We will make every attempt to honor a notary when a person walks in.
Thank You,
The Other Owner
Larry Stephens

name: Paige Williams
text: This store is always on it!! The employees are so sweet and helpful, Sundie is very patient and gets you out quick! Each time I’ve come there’s been a long line, even reaching the door, and I’ve still never spent longer than 5 mins in there. Cannot complain!

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind words.  I will pass them on to Sundy and the staff.

Larry Stephens

name: Alishua Rikard
text:
Even though my package has been lost. I’m still
Giving them a 5 star rating. Manager handled the claim well, expressed it would take awhile, still isn’t resolved but they are doing all they can. Every time I have emailed I have gotten a reply, if I call the manager gets on the line. Can’t complain really some things are a process. I hate waiting but it happens, thanks for the amazing customer service even in a bad situation.

name: zoila Frye
text: Yesterday i visited this store to Fax some papers. I was very disappointed in the way the associate that helped me was treated by her manager and management.  She was helping and doing all she could when the managerment came from the back and was very disrespectful to her in front of several customers. I now understand why the hiring sign is posted on door. If i was treated in this matter i would have walked out. The managerment there needs a attitude check. I will never grace this store again. Respect is a must to me when it comes to customer service and this management team earns none.

resp.text:
Ms Frye,
Thank you for your comments.  I do apologize for the events you witnessed and ask for your forgiveness.  I will also meet with the employee and apologize to her as well.
Thank You,
Larry Stephens

name: Jim Taylor
text: I have to frequent this store often to drop off packages being shipped from the company I work for. I feel so bad a lot of times because I have so many heavy and awkward boxes but every time I come in the entire staff is always so friendly. I really appreciate all of them being so nice. I’ve been in the shipping business for over ten years and it can be a headache at times so I understand and relate to what they all go through at times. Great store and great customer service!

resp.text: Thank you for the kind words Mr. Taylor.

name: Shelly Bates
text:
Horrible.  Notary did not fully complete her part.  Had to have document notarized again and this store refused to acknowledge fault and charged for another notarization.

However, the man who works there is very nice and always helpful. I can’t say that about the lady that works there.  She is rude and seemed annoyed that she had to notarize a document.

resp.text:
Sorry Ms. Bates for the bad information you received.  I know we talked this morning regarding the problem.  I have talked to our employee on this issue.  As discussed, we will be glad to take care of this and fix the paper work at no charge.  Please come by at your convince and ask for Larry.

Thank You,
Larry

name: Rance Czermak
text: This location is rude in that if you mess up on printing cause they don't show you how things work on their printers they will still charge you. This is not customer service and they need to understand that the mess up is with the customer service here.

resp.text: Sorry you had a bad experience.  Please call me and let me have more details on what happened.  I will be glad to fix or refund.  Ask for Larry 256-766-9843.

name: Rachel Brown
text: Two workers gave each other looks of anonnoyance the entire time I was in the store trying to ship a return for the first time. It was very uncomfortable. I wasn't holding up the line, telling anyone who walked in to please go around while I tried to figure things out. Eventually just left after the way those two ladies made me feel.

resp.text:
Ms. Wolf,
I am sorry they made you feel uncomfortable.  We want to be there to help as much as we can.  One of the girls was fairly new and was shadowing the other.  I will have a talk with the everyone to let just know of this situation and come up with ways to avoid this in the future.  I apologize and thank you for your comment.

Larry Stephens
256-766-9843

name: Amanda Moore
text: Kind staff, good location.

name: Burgess Fox
text: Staff is always helpful and goes above and beyond to help me out. I always come forgetting something like tape or my return label and they are quick to assist!

name: craig lee
text: I like the owner she is sweet but she has a hard time getting good help.I have been there on Sat and no one opened until 10am a hour late.But its the only UPS shipping in Florence now that the Mailing room closed.

name: Jo Larson
text: Stay away. Very rude employees.

resp.text: I am sorry to hear of your bad experience with us.  I will speak to our staff.  I would like to hear more about what happened so I can take more detailed actions with myself and our staff.  If you will call me at 256-766-9843 my name is Larry, or email us at store6145@theupsstore.com we would appreciate it.  Thank you.

name: Jody Olivent
text: They always try to up charge me no matter what I'm shipping and they always say the "must do xyz or we can't ship it". The most recent incident they outright refused to ship my items. Once informed that I have shipped the same thing from multiple other UPS Stores they call there national hotline. The person on the other end tells them my item is OK to ship. They then try to sneak in a $15.50 "additional handling fee" on each box. I'm told it is because of what I'm shipping. I've never been charged that fee by UPS or any of their other stores for the same items.

name: Donna Craig
text: Always courteous and knowledgeable. Love this store and the staff.

name: rob s
text: last reviewer is an idiot!! so easy to work with.. maybe they wanted something for nothing?? They went out of their way for me..

name: Tracy Bevis
text: I agree!  They always go over and beyond to make my order perfect.

name: Ashlynn Harvey
text: This is the only UPS location I use. They go out of their way to make sure everything is taken care of in a timely manner for you, and are very friendly.

name: Steven Frederick
text: Quick service, very convenient.

name: Brian Williamson
text: These guys go the extra mile, they helped me get some proposals out last minute and even dropped at UPS on their way home to make sure it got out on time! WOW!

resp.text: Thank you Brian for the kind comments.  We hope you win the work.

name: Josh White
text: The notary public is a Chinese lady who barely speaks English who insisted I need to go to my bank to find a different notary public.

name: Michael Garber
text: Suki and Daniel really take pride in what they do! I don't ship anywhere else.  Will miss these two when I move out of the area

name: B M
text: Excellent service.

name: Tiffany SP
text: I spent over $30 on gifts to a friend in this area and more than $30 to ship it to this friend.  I have been watching the tracking for over a week and it has been sitting at this post office for a few days now.  Now the tracking is saying that they are waiting for a delivery scan.  I am beyond frustrated with how long it is taking them to get one little package to someone after I spent so much to ensure it's arrival.  If I ever have to mail something in this town again, I will be sure to use FedEx or UPS...not their postal service.  DELIVER THE PACKAGE I PAID OVER $30 TO SEND TO A NICE PERSON WHO DESERVES A LITTLE HAPPINESS!

name: felix applerooster
text: Horrible Tracking and slow delivery....i ordered and was promised the 18th.......its the 21st

name: John Davis
text: This is the best Post Office location in the entire Quad-Cities area.  The people are friendly and efficient, the service is fast, and they will usually go out of their way to help you.  I live in Florence and make the drive to Muscle Shoals for the friendly service.  Truly a model of what a Post Office should be.

name: Jeremy Wade
text: Cindy and the whole crew are amazing ppl! We absolutely love our local post office. Lines are long but well worth the great service!! God bless them all!

name: Kane G.
text: How does my item STAY in your post office from July 21-23 (3 days/1 day was a sunday) ...and i live just 10 minutes away ? How hard is it to deliver mail ? Tracking this package for way too long !!

name: Crystal Poinsettia
text: Difficult to contact. I signed up for notifications for delivery of packages and I don't get notifications except through email. I try to contact them and I can't.  I have a 3 pound package that needs delivered today and they don't seem to be able to do it.  I seem to get the run around..

name: Dustin Coan
text: I have a PO Box here and never have any problem. Love the employees here!

name: Martha Hamilton - Granny's House
text: Easy in and out. Very friendly

name: david bradford
text: Great service and friendly

name: Skorch M
text: they keep hanging up in me, everytime I requestbspeak to an agent it hangs up. DO NOT USE THESE PEOPLE go to ups instead they actually care about their customers and want to help them and answer their questions. if you can avoid usps do so, it'll save you a lot of time and frustration later

name: Kenny Tran
text: The staff here are super friendly and nice. Although lines may be long during peak hours of business but the staff definitely makes up for it. If your gonna send something for next day priority, I suggest you drop it off before 2pm at this location.

name: Rosalyn Taylor
text: Website stated post office closed at 12pm. I got there at 1122am and two worker were sitting at counting talking, doors locked and yelling we are closed. Either the website need to be updated to reflect correct closing time or the workers need to be reprimanded for stealing company's time.

name: Jade
text: Kourtnee and Cynthia are incredible. Both work really hard to clear their long lines when the management doesnt schedule enough workers. The managers or who ever hang out in the back room all day need to give them a hand or a raise especially with the holidays coming up.

name: Monica G
text: Convenient location and not overcrowded like the Theodore post office. However, it is often too hot and there is trash everywhere outside and they can't even keep the doors open for box customers after hours due to vandalism at night. So, not really losing a star for something they can help but because of the area.

name: Valarie Helton
text: Convenient location. I only felt that the workers were more pleasant.

name: kristen rozar
text: I am giving this post office one star all because of the manager Jesse. I called him with a small issue of not receiving some of my mail. From the very beginning of the phone call he was the rudest and most unprofessional manager I have ever dealt with. Absolutely no professionalism to him at all!! (by asking me where do I live he asked me "where you stay?" << I don't speak that!). It was obvious from the get go that he didn't care about fixing my issue and just wanted to get me off the phone as soon as possible (by hanging up on me in the middle of me asking a question). I don't know how he became a manager but YOU SHOULD NOT BE A MANAGER IF YOU COULDN'T CARE LESS ABOUT THE CUSTOMER!!!

name: jayson fickbohm
text: Worst experience called fromo out of town to locate a package and the guy was rude and expected me to know the area when I live in a different state but my package was last checked into their store. Rude and unprofessional

name: C W
text: Very friendly staff. Small town post office. Very bucolic.

name: Cheyenne last
text: Local post office says closes at 4pm. Arrive at 3:50 doors locked. 2nd post office I tried to mail out boxes. First one at Ryland and Jordon had a sign that said go here. Not happy😔

name: George Howard
text: Excellent post office. Fast service at almost anytime and a very friendly staff. We shipped a lot of stuff through this post office and they were great!

name: Andy Bennett
text: Always friendly service and never a long wait, I am  usually the only person when going inside.

name: June Walton
text: Went in to see if I could retrieve a package before it was sent back to sender after the tracking said “no such number found.” I haven’t had a chance to put a mailbox up at my address yet. The lady was super nice to me when she explained that they can’t deliver packages without a mailbox and I am very appreciative to know that now but then I went to go check my P.O. Box and she immediately started talking to her colleague about how “people just don’t know how carrier services work and that they just think we can deliver packages without a mailbox. Where are we going to put them, on the ground?” I hardly ever get packages through usps because most places I order from sue fedex and ups and so I was unfamiliar with all this but really? Immediately think people are dumb?

name: Lindi Pearson
text: This post office is great! I go in about 3 times a month and have always had a wonderful experience. The staff has always been very friendly, accommodating, helpful, and genuinely concerned with my mail getting to me. Now my delivery person is horrible with packages, just throwing them from her window. However, the people actually working at the post office are different and I have always witnessed them being gentle and respectful of my packages.

name: B Lew
text: Great team n very helpful.

name: Crystal Dawn
text: I'm very very upset with the post office because any time my mail carrier delivers a package she will literally just throw it. most of the time this is Michael Kors perfume or name brand makeup I've had to go back to Ulta and exchange my items because they are shattered and broken twice. And if my mail carrier continues to throw my packages I will be installing a security camera and sending the video to the news. The packages I receive have air packs in them to prevent anything from getting broken but they're being throwing so hard that they are breaking and I really don't appreciate that. I spend an average of $300 on each package and to receive them broken and have to Drive 25 minutes one way to replace these items is unacceptable.

name: vanessa turner
text: As of January 1 my drive way is too dangerous...the same  drive way that’s been there for 40 years I want to know what changed in January. I received my packages last year but not one packs in 2021.   No review no negotiation just refuses to deliver!!!

resp.text: We apologize your experience at this location did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve your future experience. If you need further assistance from UPS, please contact us with your information via a Private Message or Direct Message on one of our social channels: Facebook @UPS or Twitter @UPSHelp.

name: James W. Ricci, Jr.
text: Very nice young lady assisted me.

resp.text: Thank you for the rating! We appreciate your positive rating for this UPS location.

name: Nikki Hicks
text: Pick up was fine but shouldn't have had to  the driver didn't leave it because he thought my house was vacant when all we are doing is remodeling. But my opinion is that it should have been left .

resp.text: Thank you for the rating! We appreciate your positive rating for this UPS location.

name: James Payne
text: There seem to be a lot of problem drivers at this location. I was waiting 10 feet from the door while working at home, and I get a tracking update stating no one available for delivery (time stamp is while I'm about 10 feet from door). No doorbell ring. No knock. No paper saying delivery was attempted. If they can throw it on my porch, all is good (except for the many times they put packages right in front of the garage door where I could easily accidentally back my van over them when leaving). If they have to actually go to the door...well, then I may never see the package.

name: Jalonda Smith
text:
Left huge package in the grass beside the gate. In bad weather. I’m not wimpy by any means but I will probably pay for moving it by myself. I would understand if other options were not available, we do have dogs. But, USPS and Fedex and yep even UPS have been putting packages in my old SUV for over a year now. I did check on my delivery notification to see who delivered it before I did this review. Wanted to do two and a half stars since it being delivered made it halfway right, but that isn’t an option. Since I’m still hurting down my side pretty good and the box has a hole in it, (which could have been done while not with UPS), I couldn’t bring myself to do three full stars. I would have just called to complain but apparently they don’t open till the afternoon.

Update:  dropped from two stars to one. About a month ago they left a mattress that I ordered from Amazon in Heavy Rain!! Are you kidding me? If it hadn’t been wrapped in plastic inside the box I would have went down there and explained how they would be returning it for me and buying me a new one. I mean this is just beyond unacceptable. I waited over a month before updating my review so that I could calm down about it some.

name: Martin Harris
text: Very friendly staff.. and helpful

name: Keena Witt
text: Plastic shipping bags, the kind used for shipping clothing and small items, are always covered with a fine layer of dirt that gets on my fingers when UPS ships them. I have to wash my hands after opening just one of these bags so that I don't get dirt on the items inside or on anything else. I submitted a complaint a year ago and the rep who called in response was extremely rude. She obviously only called to appease me because the dirty bags continue. When USPS ships, the bags are clean.

name: Kris Nowka
text:
Customer service at this drop off location - GREAT.  UPS Delivery out of this location - VERY FRUSTRATING.

Example:  At Christmas we were ALL home ALL day.  Lights on and doors open in the house.  UPS delivery person leaves sticker on door inside garage rather than ringing door bell for us to sign for package.  We signed the sticker authorizing them to drop it off.  The next day, we were all home again, garage door completely open, lights on.  This time they came to the FRONT door, did not ring the bell and left another sticker there.

February - They left a sticker on the door for a package that required a signature.  We signed it and put it back on the SAME door.  Next day, I was home but still left the sticker on the FRONT door.  The garage door was raised ~24 inches for the dog to come in and out.  The driver crawled under the garage door and left another sticker on the house door inside the garage.  The signed sticker is still on the FRONT door.

name: Mackey Mckinzie
text: The Best, Great Service, And People

name: Tytanio Vielfire
text: My package was supposed to be delivered days ago. I ordered an overnight package back on the 19th. It arrived at this store that same day and it's still sitting there. And I can't get any more info from them. And I'm being told they won't refund me for the overnight shipping I paid for because it's the holiday season. I understand maybe a few days. But being told I might see it by the end of next week is not doing it for me. Never again will I use this company, nor my friends and family. Just plain horrible and the customer service is somehow even worse.

name: EDWARD MYLEK
text: Been very helpful to me. Several times I unknowingly went there at times they weren't open to customers and they said nothing and were very pleasant in assisting me in shipping my packages.

name: Dewayne Jennings
text: New driver said our packages were undeliverable. We have lived at the same address for almost 5 years. Why didn't they just ask the regular driver. I'm retired military and run a business from our home. UPS Hartselle sided with the new driver, was short with me and unapologetic. I have had to call Amazon and UPS twice. UPS hung up on Amazon Customer Service. I have wasted over an hour of my time, had to speak with a rude employee from the UPS center in Hartselle and I still don't have my medical device. Our number is on the mailbox, is visible and right beside the  road. Directly opposite the mailbox is our driveway. You can easily see our house that's no more than 60 feet from the road. I can think of many words to describe this problem, but undeliverable is not one of them.

name: Lisa Witherspoon
text: The staff has always been helpful. I have never waited over 15 minutes,  even at Christmas.

name: Tiffany Burks
text: Pam their customer service "supervisor" is useless, and delivery driver is just as much can't read the proper adress and attempt delivery at wrong house and refuses to reattemp delivery at the correct house to correct his mistake. I've had problems from this hub for years just shows more and more each time I use them.

name: Nathan colley
text: As a customer and a former employee, I have no complaints.

name: MrNiceGuy420
text: Its ok got a free pen lol.

name: Cindy B.
text: Always been provided great Customer service at this center.

name: James Jones
text: Package pick up and drop off were seamless.

name: Alpha Wolf
text: Will not use this location again drivers don't know how to read the address to people house

name: Cody Poole
text: Always helpful. They are short staffed so be patient.

name: Nanci Greene
text: Excellent service

name: Roger Shedd
text: Will not answer phone or will not return your call

name: 2ndchance
text: Can any thing be done about how horrible and unreliable this business is?

name: ILikeKnafs
text: This place is horrible, should not be able to stay in business. They can not even deliver a package.

name: bearcat73mom
text: Great bunch of guys!

name: Taylor Wilson
text: If you are able to go through this ups rather than the post office do it! I always receive quality and helpful  service here. 100000x better than the post office in daphne!

name: Crystal
text: Staff has always been quick and informative!

name: Sharon Condon
text:
Best bucks in the business. Understands uniqueness of service; upscale area. Ultimate test of success, especially in the U.S.
🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟

name: Kayla Hagan
text: The sales associate,  while nice,  kept trying to pressure me to purchase the "before Christmas delivery guarantee ".... I came in on the 17th, and unsure how a package going straight up I-65 would take longer than 8 days to get there. She was hesitant on telling me other price/delivery options. I understand sales, but it is ridiculous trying to worry people on sending packages in a timely manner, and have them repeatedly ask for delivery options, especially when they are on a tight budget. I was informed by the recipient that they received the package today... so thank you for delivering the package in a timely manner, but no thanks for the ridiculous hassle to send it.

resp.text:
Hey Kayla,
I hate to hear that you felt pressured and that you felt like the associate was hesitant to give you the ground option. I think that they just wanted to make sure that you knew that yes even though there was 8 calendar days until Christmas, UPS only had 5 shipping transit days left and we can't predict when or if ground volume will be affected.

So again I'm sorry to hear about your experience but I am glad to hear that your package got there quickly.

name: Lisa Warren (Lisa C. Warren, Artist)
text: Staff is always very helpful and really nice!

name: Tristan Adrey
text: The service is fantastic.  I once had an issue that required the attention of the manager and multiple calls to UPS over a lost package. He was always very kind and courteous. That said, I do find their prices on the high side. They are certainly a luxury service and if you want to treat yourself it is worth every penny you pay! FIVE STARS all the way.

name: Alexander Renzi
text: This was the best customer service I have had at any UPS store, ever.

name: M&M Productions
text: So helpful and easy to work with. I had no clue what I've been missing out on while I was going to the other place. Special thanks to Haley and the rest of the UPS crew who obviously enjoy their job.

name: Rosalyn Rowley
text: Thomas and the staff at the Spanish Fort UPS store are amazing!!  I have asked on several occasions for them to assist me with designing invitations and they have always served me with prompt and positive feedback.  I highly recommend their services and will continue to use them for my specialty and non specialty printing and design services.

name: Laura Griffin
text: Great store! The owner is a great guy that really cares about his customers. He's even helpful to me at my The UPS Store in Pensacola!! He has helped us with print projects that our equipment can't handle.

name: Michele Loussaert
text: I don't use any other UPS store.   Staff is very friendly and helpful.   I recommend this UPS store for all your shipping, mailing and printing!   Everyone is always so nice.    Thank You Spanish Fort UPS Store!   :)

name: Highway To Happy
text: Have been to the store twice recently and was provided excellent service both times.  I would highly recommend this location.  Will definitely be back.

name: Andrew Hollingsworth
text: Best service, smiling faces and direct action on shipping. Always a smooth transaction at this store.

name: Lisa Becker
text: These folks are really professional and very accommodating. They have gone above and beyond in customer service for me, and I'm just a regular customer. We travel, so we really rely on them and they have never let us down.

name: Scott Blair (Scott the Wheelman)
text: Thomas and his crew have been printing my box labels for years.  They constantly upgrade their technology.  I highly recommend them for printing as well as shipping services.

name: Thomas Hanrahan
text: The staff here is professional, friendly and goes out of its way to help, especially when we're on a deadline. Their work is top of the line. Highly recommend.

name: Courtney Howard
text: Great experience each time I've visited this store.  Everyone is very friendly and genuinely helpful.  Only time I was not thrilled was when I took a 10 page doc to be scanned and emailed and it costs me nearly $10...a little sticker shock.

name: Aaron Williams
text: The staff is great, they take care of their customers and the location is really convenient.  I have used this location for over 5 years now and the team that run the store are Great!

name: Sheri Gwin
text: They know you by name!!!  So it becomes a personal thing for me.  Great service and good people.

name: Johnny Wiggins
text: They printed three large print jobs for my business and great pricing and awesome quality and job complete on time

name: Brittany Pickens
text: Super friendly, efficient and helpful!

name: HDM List
text: This is a great location...lots of services available at reasonable prices and all staff members I have encountered are friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Angela
text: I've used this UPS store on 4 occasions (mailed packages & for print services) in 2017!  Great print quality, fast & excellent service every time.

name: Ramona Babb
text: Always helpful, designed door hangers flyer and signs for our business

name: Christy George
text: They are always super helpful and kind.

name: Bennie Jones
text: I got verry good. Service from the  UPS atore

name: Elise Jones
text: Awesome staff, quick turn~around on deadlines!!

name: Kevin M
text: Fast service!

name: Brandon Lewis
text: Nice and polite people an very helpful

name: Ed Souza
text: The owner at this location goes extras miles to help you!

name: Jeffrey Smoot
text: Always fast and friendly!

name: Kristen Harris
text: Lydrell is everything that makes USPS great. He's such a responsive post man that takes care of those on his route, and even those who were formerly on his route.

name: CHEER
text: Eugine was very rude to me. He had a terrible attitude. Very rude demeanor and he rolled his eyes at me when I asked him a question. Terrible experience! All I wanted to to was safely mail my families Holiday gifts.

name: Missy Fantusi
text: There was no waiting, and people were social distancing. Very good service

name: Gabe Ledesmas
text: This branch is looong overdue for an upgrade. There are no drop bins for packages, no self serve kiosks. Yet there are what seems to be miles and miles of PO boxes? Now during Covid, you are asking me to wait in line, in tiny confined space with about 10 other people?! I literally drive to other post offices to avoid this one. I give it two stars because the employees seem to always be helpful and efficient, although their customer service demeanor could use  a little help.

name: Zack Shields
text: Both employees were friendly and helpful.  I had to wait a bit in line, but nothing too bad, and this is understandable because both customers in front of me were mailing international items.  This has been the best experience at a United States Post Office that I have had at any of their locations.

name: Keey Keey
text: Eugene wasn’t helpful bad customer service

name: lana mccay
text: the floors and p.o box need cleaning also the doors

name: Boadicea Holman
text: After I moved in the apartments off of Clinton Avenue about a year ago, I have been having the hardest time with my mail. I live with a family of 5 people and my last name is the only different one out the group that receives mail. My mail will not end up in the mailbox when it is expected to. The first time was for my driver’s License and it was not delivered. The court house had to send it out a second time and thankfully it showed up or else I would’ve had to pay another $60 for a retake. Then, it was my notice for my Medicaid that lets me know I need to refile. I had not received it and so now I don’t have insurance coverage. Now it is my debit card and I had one that was supposed to be here a month ago and it is still not here. So I called my bank so they can send me another one after confirming my address, and I am giving them until tomorrow before I go to extreme measures. I have went up to the post office and filed claim cards and talked to the delivery supervisor myself because the delivery people won’t put my mail on the box. Even my mother has talked to managers and supervisors before me. My last name is literally on the inside of the box, written on an index card and tapped on the inside of the door, that is how drastic it is. If you can go anywhere else to get your mail, do it, because right now I am struggling to pay my bills because of this nonsense.

name: Philip Anderson

text: Clerks are usually friendly but they rarely answer the phone. Lines are almost always long, but the kiosk for self shipping is AMAZING. They should have more of those kiosks available for the holidays.

name: Jeska Lewis

name: Lady T

text: Hey lazy P.O.S. mail lady. Use your pea brain for once. DO NOT LEAVE PACKAGES OUTSIDE OF BUSINESSES BECAUSE YOU ARE TOO LAZY AND OR OVERWEIGHT TO TAKE THEM BACK TO THE POST OFFICE. IT DOESNT MATTER WHAT THE PACKAGES SAT, ESPECIALLY WHEN I HAVE TOLD YOU ON NUMEROUS OCCASIONS NOT TO LEAVE PACKAGES OUTSIDE THE DOOR. I WILL DO EVERYTHING IN MY POWER TO GET YOU FIRED. IM TIRED OF YOU LAZY POST OFFICE PEOPLE. USELESS

text: It's a busy post office but I come in with my stuff prepackaged and get in and out . They all recognize me now and always say hello.

text: This is the worst post  I ever seen I can't to move away from here.

text: Speedy, friendly service.  Clean, spacious office in a convenient location.

name: Donna Houser-Larriett
text: I’m STILL searching for my package that they delivered a street over from my home.  I haven’t heard from the postmaster and I stop by every few weeks and leave my info.  Ten months now and they have not paid me or come up with my package.  If I go in and see an employee wearing my merchandise I’m immediately calling the authorities!!!

name: John Moseley
text: New facility.  Very clean and well lit. The people are nice.

name: chelsey love
text:
I never write reviews, but im litterally fed up with this office and their mail drivers id give them a 0 if possible. Im not sure why they havent closed this location down.

Im in a warehouse location and we have 3 signs up that direct them to deliver larger items to the back building that wont fit into the mail box.

Our front office is closed after 10 am.
they ignore the signs and either leave items in front of the door or attempt to re deliver instead of driving their trucks back to the open dock through the gate and just leave them there. We’ve also talked to 2 drivers about this also and they continue to be lazy and dont so it.

We’re pretty much done and wont be using USPS for deliveries anymore other than mail, we’ve had over several issues and its not worth dealing with the location or the drivers about because their lazy and dont care so they dont fix anything.

name: Glen Malone II
text: The place looks really good and the people helping are very nice.

name: Master Yoshi
text: Again, I'm going to give this post office 1 star because there is no way to take away stars. This is the third time in 6 months though this time they have lied, lost my package or threw it away. There is a disconnect between their corporate and their office management, management doesn't respond to emails nor call customers back, they don't take responsibility for their employees throwing away packages, and can't handle their business at all. The office itself is a joke and the employees don't care about anything besides getting you out of their locations even if it means they lie to get you to go away. Absolutely terrible and only seems to be getting worse.

name: Lisa Thompson
text: The postal workers are thrives,stupid,can't read,the I tire time I've lived in the same place for 25 yrs mail is never delivered correctly,I've lost SO MUCH MERCHANDISE,mail,checks,had utilities cut off,invitations, etc due to non delivery!! This place is a fkn joke! If you call to complain nothing is done,I've even received mail with racist remarks like trash on them!

name: Key Freeman
text: I'm pissed off because no one ever answers the phone. Every Tuesday now for a while the post man never runs n if they do it's super late n I wanna know why. If I call the 1800# it's still hard to get someone on.the damn phone. I don't want to go up there n be rude bt it looks like I'mma have no choice.

name: Mz Pretty
text: Their attitudes are very NASTY!!! They talk to the customers very bad !! Every time I send mail to my husband he never gets in the time frame that it takes!!! I hate this post office!!! They need to FIRE EVERY LAST ONE OF THEM AND HIRE A WHOLE NEW STAFF IMMEDIATELY!!!!!!

text: the new location is nice and much more efficient

text: They loose and misdirect an appalling percentage of the  parcels that were supposed to be directed to me and they are not accountable!

text: Nice people work there.

name: Danielle Kinney
text: This is probably the worst post office I’ve ever had to deal with. I am constantly getting others people’s mail/packages. My mail doesn’t get delivered for weeks. Packages saying they are delivered but never delivered or even attempted. Notes left saying they attempted to deliver but no one was home when there’s someone at my house at all times. Can never answer their phones. This will be the second time I have to go down to the office to retrieve my package. Our lady before was okay, but our new lady is absolutely terrible. So frustrating

name: Bethany Golden
text: We have had a lot of issues getting our mail delivered. Packages left on the ground by the mailbox, packages delivered days late, paper mail arriving weeks after the post date, the mail carrier honking the horn the entire way up the driveway, I could go on. But what has really frustrated us is that a package was jammed in the door between the screen and regular door and it broke the screen door. When I called, the supervisor is completely denying that it is possible that this happened. She came out, looked, and is sticking to the mail carrier’s story that she didn’t close the door all the way. When I pointed out that the package was not wet after it rained, meaning that she had to have closed the door hard, and pointed out that she left the paper mail in the door as well, which included a check, the supervisor said the carrier did this as a kindness since it was raining. Okay, but it is not kindness to break the door, lie about whether you closed it, leave paper mail in the door, and then refuse to accept any kind of part in what happened. The supervisor is saying there is no way the carrier could have broken it and that they are not going to do anything. So we have to eat the cost of fixing it and the worst part is that there is no other way to get mail except to go through this post office. So frustrating. I hope there is some sort of accountability at some point and that these things stop happening.

name: Angela Nagle
text:
This is the fourth or fifth time I've had issue with this post office/carrier not delivering my packages correctly. The most recent, last week, she left a pair of shoes sitting on the road underneath my mailbox. I am now being told by the seller (and tracking number) that another pair I ordered were delivered, although I have yet to see them. I've tried talking to a supervisor, but she's never available, and won't return my calls.  This carrier apparently sets her own schedule a she is apt to show up as late as 8:00 PM, as well a on Sundays because she didn't do her deliveries on Saturday. The last package I had issues with was never delivered to my address, but because it was only about $6 and the seller (on EBay) refunded my money, i let it go. Well, i am done letting things go where this post office is concerned! DO YOUR JOB!

Update one year later:
Still constantly delivering my packages to the wrong address, and you can NEVER get anyone to answer the phone at their location. Horrible service from both the carrier, and the manager at this location.

name: Jessica Campbell
text: Always have a problem getting packages from them. Love getting a notice that something needs a signature only to see on the box that its not required. OR my favorite...attempt to deliver and some crazy reason they couldn't ...yet my camera shows no one ever attempted to ring the door. Then to add..your hours suck so it becomes a nightmare trying to make it up there in time to get my stuff.

name: Chris Mosley
text: I LOVE my local McCalla Post Office folk!  When I go in to the counter I'm treated with courtesy, and they're always helpful.  Mail delivery at the house is reliable, and when I occasionally see my mail carrier, she is always friendly.

name: Wrath
text: Want to have your stuff either lost or stolen? Go ahead. Don't expect any employee here to be honest or take any responsibility either. Can't say I'm surprised though, this is USPS afterall. The incompetence here is a complete joke. Oh and if you have an issue, the post master will say one thing then do another. And change her story the whole time. Essentially try to lie her way out of it instead of actually doing her job.

name: Casey Benefield (Think A Little)
text:
Horrible experience. I started doing business with this one because the Bessemer post office felt that because I "receive a lot of packages" that they can just help themselves and keep stuff for themselves. This post office wasn't much better.

I had a paid PO box... and of course, the employees would CRAM items  and break them, stuffing the box instead of using a locker. The clerk had  behaved poorly to me, so I closed my box.

Later, my brother closed his, because this post office decided that they would treat him like garbage too. If I'm not mistaken, the same clerk I had trouble with, raised her voice with him. Of course, nobody at customer relations, no postmaster ever cared.

Pick a different parcel carrier, because at least you'll get your money's worth, instead of being treated like a criminal.

name: Brian Baker
text: Been waiting all week on a package. Was transferred from FedEx to the post office yesterday. Today tracking said out for delivery. Never received package and comment from USPS says " customer not available or business closed" it's a residence and I've been here waiting on it! They never attempted to deliver it or the rest of my mail!

name: KEN BROWNSON
text: Always helpful go there Dailey there job there is done to detail very nice always patient with me and my messups .

name: Michael M
text: Whoever is coming to my house has VANDALIZED my mailbox with the wrong street address, 3 times now. I even made a new post, a brand new white mailbox with clear numbers on the sides, and woke up the next day to the wrong address etched on the front again. Absolutely ridiculous, I am afraid to ship anything to my house now in fear that it will go wherever this person decides it should.

name: Joe Dixon
text: This PO has mis-delivered mail to a similar address as mine several times, but when I called the Post Master he was courteous and apologetic. Since that time, mis-delivery has not occurred. The carriers are always friendly. When much younger I worked at the PO, and I would say for a small town PO, this one is fine.

text: Have tried calling 10 times and let phone ring until it disconnects.  What bullshit.  They are open.  I called huey town post office they answered 1st try and verified mccalla phone number

name: Mark Clark
text: Can't even get a call returned are talk anyone REALLY....... this automated phone service a••s

name: Becky Mealer
text: They are always so rude.

name: Lee Shaw
text: I recieve mail and FedEx at my home address where I run a business. My home is clearly marked with house number and can be located by Google. For some reason UPS can't find my residence lately.  Its either left in the neighborhood near my address or they simply mark it address not found and send the product back. This is out of Oxford Alabama location. If they can't find drivers that are intelligent enough to locate an address perhaps they should find another driver for this area. The worst part is I have talked with a live person on the phone and have been advised my package would be delivered tomorrow and it doesn't happen . This time the package was returned and I'm out $300

resp.text: We apologize your experience at this location did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve your future experience. If you need further assistance from UPS, please contact us with your information via a Private Message or Direct Message on one of our social channels: Facebook @UPS or Twitter @UPSHelp.

name: WhiskerBiscuit
text:
I’ve been waiting on a package for a week and when it’s supposed to be delivered the driver states that the address is wrong. The driver is wrong. My wife saw the UPS truck pull in front of our house, then leave with no attempt to deliver the package. The address is the same as it’s always been for years. I called to let customer service know that the address was correct and asked if the drive could call me and I was help them find my house or meet them to get may package which I need very badly. I waited for a phone call that I was told I would receive before 8pm while waiting at the front window of the house so I would see truck if it passed. I never received the call. At 9pm I received a notification saying that the package couldn’t be delivered because a signature was required and that the delivery is rescheduled for the following week. The driver was in the wrong here again too be cause the drive never came back to the house. Like I said earlier, I was waiting and never saw or heard anyone. There was NO note for a delivery attempt. I even checked my cameras to find that no one stoped by. Now because of a drivers negligence, I’m losing money on a job that I am unable to perform due to the part that was supposed to be delivered. I’m losing way more money than what it will take to pay the drive overtime and fuel to drive out here again.

This is very poor business.

resp.text: We apologize your experience at this location did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve your future experience. If you need further assistance from UPS, please contact us with your information via a Private Message or Direct Message on one of our social channels: Facebook @UPS or Twitter @UPSHelp.

text: 5e7f793eca422283cb94af3f was lost and can't find my package

name: Brittney Frankum
text: I got a delivery notification after 1 yesterday saying package left at front door. I got home from work and saw no package. I went down the street to a house that has the same address except they are SE to my NE, we get each other's mail all the time, but they didn't have the package. At this point I figured it got stolen off my front porch until this morning when my next door neighbor carried over the saddest looking package I've ever seen. You see, it rained all evening and night last night - and my package was not only delivered to the WRONG house, but was left on an uncovered front stoop when it was very obvious that it was going to rain. Overlooking the fact that they delivered to the wrong house, that house had a carport they could have left the package under, and with it being the holidays and people stealing packages being a common occurrence, leaving any packages out in the open like that when there's the option of a carport is ridiculous. Lazy delivering by people who obviously can't be bothered to do their job. I understand there's a good chance it was a seasonal worker but there's no excuse. I'm going to try and post a picture of the box, I'm not seeing the option to though. It disintegrated in my hands and the package inside was wet too. Extremely dissatisfied.

name: Raymond curvin
text: Left my delivered package hidden as I reqhested

name: Tasha H
text: Come they will help with anything that you might need

name: Corry Henderson
text: Lost a small package, was supposed to be delivered with express shipping 4 business days ago. Went to the facility they say they have no clue where my package is.

name: Brian Parton
text: Package pickup was fast and easy. The lady at the counter helped me out and got my package to me within just a few minutes of arriving. The hours are a bit restrictive, only open from 4-7 pm. Other that that, my experience was a pleasant one.

name: barry maxwell
text: If I could give negative stars I would. This place is a joke. I was having 2 packages delivered in the same day. One package was a mattress in a box. The other was some clothing. The clothing was delivered but the mattress was not. UPS stated that "I" requested to not have it delivered. The real reason is that the driver was just to lazy to take the package out of the truck and leave it on my porch. Very dissatisfied with the service of this establishment. Definelty the worst experience I have ever had with UPS. Avoid shipping or receiving anything from this location.

name: Edith Kennedy Couch
text: Horrible customer service!!!!  Will NEVER use again or buy a product that uses UPS.

name: Joey Clapper
text: I visit here and pick up on hold packages (by request) every week. I see friendly people with smiling faces doing their jobs. Most of the negative reviews are UPS general complaints, not necessarily directly related to the package handling center, which is the physical place being reviewed.

name: Alexis Becher
text:
This is the second time UPS has delivered a package of mine to the wrong address in Sherwood Forrest. What's so confusing about the house number if your on the correct street? How do you take two different packages with the same shipping address and name to two different houses?
That's called NOT DOING YOUR JOB!
And not caring enough that someone paid for your services, trusted in your company a second time for you to just do it again.

text: I can't give anything but a one star because my package was lost and I never received it. And now for the second time it has been two days and I still don't have the replacement that I ordered. This is so incompetent I can't even explain anymore.

name: Tiffany Nguyen
text: The two woman and man that worked at UPS, they are the sweetest and most understanding people ever. I had to drop off two packages returning to amazon and I also had an incident with my car and told them about it and asked for their advice. I’m 20 and I have a kid with me and I basically ran over a pothole resulting my passenger car tires to be flattened. They let me stay until closing because I came around 5:30pm and they stayed with me until 6:10pm because outside was extremely hot. The tow truck came and got me and I thanked those two women who were extremely helpful! Thank you again UPS ladies!

resp.text: Thank you, Ms. Nguyen.  We are very pleased that you had a good experience with The UPS Store personnel.  Please let us know if you need anything else in the future.  The management team.

name: Dennis Duran
text: I love this place. Everyone is efficient and genuinely nice at the same time.  You must visit this UPS Store and you'll see what I am talking about.  Don't believe the bad reviews.  Go see for yourself!

resp.text: Thank you so much, Dennis.  This is how we want to provide customer service, service with a smile!  The owners.

name: Jessica
text: Very nice and friendly. Quick service for what I needed!

resp.text: Thank you very much, Jessica.  We all work very hard every single day to provide excellent service and, at the same time, try to get the job done quickly so you can go on with your day. If you ever have any questions or need anything, please do not hesitate to let us know.  The owners.

name: Leighton Kellett
text: They were very rude and actually said they were refusing me service and the lady picked up my box that wasn’t taped and dropped the $1200 tripod that inside. I will never go back here again. The Saraland store has always had way better service than these inconsiderate people...

name: Eugene Roberts
text: Very rude to customers and to other employees. This business needs to be reevaluated by UPS. I would give negative stars if I could. Never will be back. I think the rude lady is the owner if not she said she was (older lady with glasses). She wasn't even the one helping me.

resp.text: Mr. Roberts - We are very sorry for your negative experience at The UPS Store and will strive to improve customer satisfaction.  The owners.

name: Aalyia Shaukat
text: Awesome service. Drive out of my way for this ups store because they're very helpful and encourage their patrons to wear masks before entering the store -- something especially important during the holiday season! Feels much safer that way. Would highly recommend.

resp.text: Aalyia, you made my day!  I am so happy that you are pleased with our service.  Thank you for taking time out of your day to rate our business.  Ms. Rasool - Owner

name: Lisa Sheets
text: I was humiliated by a female employee when I entered, will never enter this store again. I had my mask on but it wasn’t on tight enough for her. She was panicking and wanting me to fix it and I was trying to make it tighter. She looked so afraid so I tried to ease her mind by letting her know I already had Covid (was quarantined all alone at Christmas) and she called me a liar. She made me go outside and change my mask to one of hers.  No customer should ever be treated this way. I will use USPS or Fed Ex from here on out.

resp.text: We apologize you are unhappy with your visit.  The pandemic has been a big stressor for everyone.

name: Martrisse Haynes
text:
The lady Regina is extremely rude to customers and her employees. I hate this location is so close to my home but moving forward, I will drive further to be treated with decency. Per recent reviews, I can see this isn’t an isolated experience and something needs to be done about how she treats people. Also, she should be mindful about following people to their car to continue trying to explain her invalid point.
Edit: in Regina’s response, she states she carried my trampoline to the car. She did not, one of her male associates carried it. Also, I waited 30 mins and Regina said she was a packaging expert but I should continue to wait for her husband to return to find a box for it to fit in. Waiting 30 mins is not me being in a rush, this was my SECOND attempt at getting a box at this location. I can’t believe she would blatantly lie. After 30 mins and her following me to my car, I went to Saraland and was able to get my box packaged within 5 mins. I have a positive review posted there.

name: vera bettin
text: Don’t waste your time!

name: BJ Blackwell
text: Terrible experience in every way.  I was simply trying to get some documents notarized and I completely felt like I was in the twilight zone.   They charged me $70 UPFRONT before the notary service was complete without an invoice or any service fee chart so I knew what I was paying for AFTER I had to leave and come back because I had signed the “non-notarized” documents before I got there and had to go back to Office Depot to reprint the 36+ pages.  The owners wife (at least I think she was) was loud and rude to at least 3 of the customers while I was there (including me) over their face mask and another guy a signed document and seemed like she was on something based off of her demeanor and disposition.   The same thing happened to another customer while I was there as she quickly and loudly yelled “IT’S ILLEGAL SIR!!” because his document he had was signed in a “non-notary” place with more than 5 customers in the business.   I was embarrassed for them, the young employees that were being trained that this is classified as customer service, and myself for sharing the same air as these total and complete morons.

resp.text: Mr. Blackwell - We would like to apologize for your negative experience at our store.  I'd like to learn more about your specific situation and make things right.  Please contact me at 251-460-4096 at your earliest convenience.  I look forward to speaking with you and resolving any misunderstandings.  Ms. Rasool

name: Hina Q
text: Convenient location and a lot of services provided. I'm always pleased with the service I get here.

resp.text: Thank you so much, Hina.  We are happy to hear that you are pleased with our service!  The Owners

name: Margaret Elizabeth
text: I’ve made my point.  Perhaps you will think about how you treat customers in the future. Regina Rasool, be honest with yourself AND others. And learn to be kind and fair.

Best Regards - Regina Rasool, Owner

name: Mesha McDonald
text: TERRIBLE SERVICE! I recently visited this location and the owner was incredibly RUDE! I was not quite ready to be checked out and he told me and I quote "I can't stand here all day and wait on you." I politely asked him to calm down because I wasn't asking him too. He proceeded to raise his voice at me and threaten to kick me out of the store! His response was completely over the top and unwarranted! I will NEVER be visiting this location again! I have been to other locations and I have never had a bad experience or been so disrespected.

resp.text: Ms. McDonald, I'm happy that my associate, Christian, was able to spend at least 15 minutes helping you with your Amazon return, but I am not happy that you left unsatisfied.  You may contact us at store2350@theupsstore.com for us to help you resolve any issues at hand.

name: Justin imsand
text: This store is by far the worst I have ever stepped foot in. Ran by a husband and wife. If the husband would admit the wife into a retirement home for crazy people and keep her out of this store he would surely see a extreme increase in revenue.

resp.text: Mr. Imsand, we're sorry you feel the way you do.  We are, unfortunately, short staffed this week due to a death in the family of an employee, coupled with being extremely busy.  We apologize for your untoward experience in our store.  Please contact us at 460-4096 or store2350@theupsstore.com so that we can clear up any misunderstandings you may have regarding this UPS Store.  Thank You Sir - The owners

name: Noell Espaillat
text:
I am so thankful to Kenzie and Aysha for their help today! I went to another postal carrier and they wanted to charge me $170 per package for a $25 little blanket! So I left and went to the UPS store and they were so nice and helpful and I shipped both packages and got a book of stamps for less than $50!
On top of meeting my needs, they were very nice and helpful. Thank you ladies! I should have seen you first, this is my only stop from now on!

resp.text: Noell, it was truly a pleasure to serve you!  We would really like to see you again.  Please let us know if there's anything we can help you with.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed your visit at The UPS Store 2350 and took time to leave a Google review!  Sincerely, Regina Rasool - Owner, The UPS Store

name: Lotus
text: Went to this location to ship a very small package that was going to Poland. I was on my lunch break and was pressed for time. I waited patiently as the clerk attempted to try to figure out how the address should be input it into her system. It ended up taking about 15 minutes or so for this process. There was really no problem with this, even though it was inconvenient. However, the employee then stated you're probably not going to want to ship this once you know how much the prices to which I responded while how much is it, and she stated give me a couple of minutes and I'll tell you. I found this quite interesting as she obviously knew what the price is going to be. She ended up quoting me over $190 for the shipment!! Again one hundred and ninty dollars!.. Keep in mind that this package was about 6"x5"x2".. A very small package. She then proceeded to tell me that USPS would charge me $95 for the package. I looked at her and asked if she was joking.. No, she was not. I quickly grabbed the package and left the store. I drove over to USPS down the road and went in to have the package shipped. The total cost for priority mail ended up being $32.50. Moral of the story, this place is a huge rip-off with very inflated pricing and should not be used under any circumstances for international delivery. They obviously cannot be trusted and do not know how to correctly price and ship packages. Avoid this location, or any third-party UPS package store for that matter. Just stick with either handling it online and using it as a drop-off source or avoid it altogether.

name: Paul Thompson
text: I would give more than 5 stars if I could. Amazing customer service. I had some packages arrive on a Saturday that I was unable to pick up that I needed before my flight the next day.  I left a message on their phone and they allowed me to pick them up over 3hrs after they closed on the weekend. I have done business there before and will continue to do so in the future.  They owners who helped me were super nice.

resp.text: Thank You, Mr. Thompson.  We were happy to help you in your time of need.

name: Ellen Carter
text: I have dealt with this store for 6 years. They are family owned and operated, so they are able to provide personal service. I have sometimes been a pain in the neck customer, forgetting to bring an address or something. They will let me go ahead and leave my package and call in the address... They have held my mail for extended periods when I have been traveling... They have looked through my mail for certain deliveries for me when I have called to request that... They have even checked my amazon email for me to do a return.... Way above the average customer service. I am very glad they are there for me.

resp.text: You are so sweet, Ms. Carter!  We enjoy seeing you in our store, so don't worry.  You are no trouble to us at all!  Anything we can do to help, we'll continue to do for you.

name: Greg Hoffmann
text:
I am super impressed with the top notch customer service and the kindness of the staff at this UPS store.
This is a busy store but they always do a great job at moving things along as quickly as possible.
I would recommend this UPS store anytime!

resp.text: Thank you, Greg!

name: Michael Burke
text: Very kind and patient staff, who assisted me with my unusual predicaments with accepting and returning items over the holidays. Not sure what issues these others are reporting, perhaps just dissatisfied with UPS-wide pricing and practices.

resp.text:
Thank you so much, Mr. Burke.  If there is anything you ever need help with, please let us know.
Sincerely, Regina Rasool, Owner-The UPS Store.

name: jin lim
text:
Tried to drop off a package with a return label from something I bought online. They said it is not proper packaging and wouldn't let me drop it off. That's a lie. It was the same packaging that I received it in so that can't be improper packaging. It was literally a ups box.  They are just trying to make money from repackaging items. I guess the UPS business isn't doing so well.  There is a reason there are so many bad reviews.

edit: Owner is lying in response.

resp.text: Online businesses who ship boxes to customers do not ship using UPS branded boxes.  These boxes are exclusive for The UPS Store Franchises and affiliates only.  I am sorry for your experience, whatever that might have been.  If it was my store that you visited and had this experience, it is quite possible your box was either badly damaged or was devoid of the proper amount of packaging materials and we merely suggested that you add packaging materials.  We work hard to assure that our customers packages are packed and shipped the way we would ship our own personal packages.  If any customer is having an unpleasant experience at any UPS location, please ask to speak to the owner or manager and they will gladly be able to resolve any situation, as we never want our customers to leave unhappy.   R. Rasool, Owner, The UPS Store #2350

name: Pamela Ramos-Brown
text:
All of my experiences have been pleasant and professional.  The owners, including the family members, and the staff have been very accommodating, courteous, and genuinely friendly.

On more than one occasion they have gone above and beyond to help.  It's a great place for personal and business mail and other office services.

resp.text: Ms. Ramos Brown, I hope you are doing well.  I just wanted to take a minute to tell  you how much your positive review means to us.  It is customers like you who help us to feel positively about running a business in these hard times.  The owners

name: Aaliyah Dang
text: KENZIE IS THE BOMB DOT COM. I DEMAND HER A RAISE AND THAT’S PERIOD! She was SO helpful while I was looking hella lost! Best UPS store Everrrrr!!

resp.text: Thank You So Much, Erica.  You made our day! Owners, The UPS Store

name: Ahmad Omar
text: Best UPS store in town!! Very clean, has great customer service and is open later than all the others. Owners are very hospitable and really do care about their customers. I dont know what other people are talking about...I will not go to any other UPS store after visiting this one!

name: Ashleigh Ely
text: Awful service . They did not help me . I will never go back to this location

resp.text: Ms. Ely, I'm sorry you feel that way.  We personally make every effort to address customers needs as they enter The UPS Store.  Is it possible that we were extremely busy that day?   We would like to hear your side, so please reach out to one of the owners during regular business hours.  We would like to clear up any possible misunderstanding.  Thank you.

name: Kathy Noel
text:
Above and beyond the assistance I expected to get a package shipped out.
Please make this your first stop ....

resp.text: Thank You Kathy!  We appreciate your business and hope to see you again soon.  Regina Rasool - Owner, The UPS Store

name: Marc Lichtenberger
text: I went in to get a document notarized.  Guy made it impossible to sign a one page document.  Wanted to see other documents in escrow package that had nothing to do with the grant deed.  He was not rude though and was professional up to the point where I thought he was being overly intrusive.

name: John H
text:
Wow, this is proof that people are more likely to say something if they have something negative to say. I am an eBay seller and I have been going to this UPS Store weekly for the past 3 years and I never thought once to leave a positive review. That says it all.

The owner is super nice and he is an extremely hard worker.  In fact 1 day I came in with a bad attitude and he took the "high road" remaining calm and professional. I have regretted it ever since. As for the shipping errors, we are all human and things happen, but if this was really a problem I would know. After all, I have shipped out over a hundred items from this location with literally no issues.

I wish some of the reviewers on here would revisit their ratings. For example, 1 review said there experience was "bordering on the unfavorable" but then they left a 1 star rating. How is that possible? It also made me sad when I read the 1 star review left b/c they were upset that the workers tried to sell them their services. Please reconsider this review. They are running a business and everyone's got eat. Thanks!

resp.text: Mr. John, when reading your review from several years ago, I feel a great sense of appreciation for you taking your valuable time to write such a considerate and detailed review.  I agree with everything you have said in your review.  I hope you are doing well and we hope to see you again in the future.  The owners

name: Andrea Curtis
text: We have had to utilize this location for the past year because the UPS driver that delivers to our area refuses to leave packages at our door or in the office of our apartment complex.  Every time we have to pick up, there is some sort of problem - or they are very put out because we are asking for our package.  Most of the time things are delayed.  The staff here has been a rotating door, so usually they have to get a manager involved to answer simple questions.  Management team is incredibly rude and very condescending - to their employees and customers.

name: Sue Rollins
text: Excellent customer service.  Helpful and courteous everytime I have been in there.

name: Helena Roldan
text:
Unhelpful, rigid staff.  Today...”I cant allow you to (use our stapler or seal) your envelope package in our store.  It is against UPS policy.” But they could sell me a “self sealing envelope for $3.50.”
Every time I have to do a simple transaction with
they manage to irritate me beyond belief.

name: Ghulam Rasool
text: You may pick up someone else's My Choice or Access Point Package if you provide the tracking number.  I love this store!

name: Katy McGehee
text: By far the worst experience I've had at a ups store. Regina Rasool was incredibly rude and asked for information that did not pertain to the situation. She made us incredibly uncomfortable and was insensitive to the situation at hand. I have filed a complaint with ups and although she is the wife of the owner, I hope to have her removed from the store. The lady she "helped" in front of us, left upset as well. This woman does not need to be customer service. Ever.

name: John Kozachyn
text: Terrible customer service owner tried to hustle us and over charge worst experience ever WILL NOT be returning to that location ever again......my 5month old baby could do better! Very disappointed and upset they set me back by a few days to a week and they really don't care at all I don't recommend this store plz don't be fooled by the management they will set you or your small business back and hustle you too I guarantee!!!

name: Shane Caton
text: I asked to email the file to be printed and he said ok. Then wanted to charge me a fee to check his email to print the documents. I do this at other UPS stores FedEx Office Staples and Office Depot/Max and have never been cherry a fee for them printing from their email. I walked out.

name: Sherri Hudson
text:
If you live alone and have no access to picking up your package, nobody is allowed to pick it up for you, which is total bs. How are single people supposed to get their stuff if they're never home and have nobody "eligible" living at their address to get it? Totally biased and unfair. They want you to pay again for reshipment. A bunch of jerks.

And mediocre costumer service.

name: Chico Peebles
text: Staff is helpful and very friendly.

resp.text:
Thank You Chico.  Very nice of you to take the time to review The UPS Store.
Regina Rasool, Owner

name: Judy Williams
text:
It's a shame when you have to call the police over $7, in order to get a business owner to do what is right by the customer.

I must first say this: Not once did I raise my voice (I lost my voice so I am vocally incapable of yelling) or curse at him.

Incident: I got a POA document notarized by Razuel on Saturday, and mailed it the same to Nationwide. Nationwide Collison Manager said via email that the document was not acceptable by DMV because additional information was written on the document by Raquel. On Wednesday I return to the store and speak with his wife "G" and explain what happened and show her the email copy indicating the mistake. She states that this particular document does not require "for _ only" and instructed me to come back and they will redo it for Free. Today, 9/20, I go in speak with Raquel, catch him up on my conversation with his wife. His reason for not redoing was because nationwide rep was not present in store with me and it would be illegal for him to do so. I request a refund for his document error. At first his stance was services were rendered because the dicument has been accepted in the past and its his principles (whatever they were). Finally we agree that he should issue a refund. He soon changed his mind and after I suggested him and his wife get on one accord with the policy and look into new notary standards. Razuel ordered me to leave because I should just be quiet (his words). I obviously refused and called the police instead.
A refund was eventually issued after the police arrived, however not before Razuel allowed his pride to dictate his moral code.

Customers are in the business of donating funds to your business. Yes, you should be accountable for rendering services properly.

name: nancy newman
text: 0 stars.....have been twice recently. The owners are rude, the place has a horrible odor and there is NO customer service. Only objective from these people is to mae more $ off of you. Repackaging (and charging Comcast/vendor) when in boxes sent straight by them. Sending an item to Amazon in the same box it as delivered in and insisting it had to be repackaged or he 'wouldnt take responsiblity'. Did i want to buy tape and do it? $$$ every little bit he can gouge helps him. Then when i was leaving he was a smart aleck. Never will i step foot in this place again HORRIBLE!!!!!

name: Doug Roberts
text: Definitely a scammer

name: Abdul Majid
text: been their atleast 10 times now and got the work done in less than 2 mins almost every time.

resp.text: Thank you sir for your favorable review.  We appreciate you as a customer.  The owners

name: belal abdullah
text: Excellent service!

resp.text: Thank You Belal!  Love that you took time out in your busy day as a business owner yourself.  Hope you have a busy holiday season!  Regina Rasool - Owner, The UPS Store!

name: Jon Ben
text: Awful ups store.  Bad customer service, was not polite to the black customer in front of me in line, I turned and walked back out after seeing that.

name: Jalexia Collins
text: Manager very nasty! Needs better customer service experience!

name: Mrs. Lambert
text: Hours are not open until 7pm. This place closes at 630.  So don't rely on Google or ups fir this information. Bad

resp.text: Ms. Lambert, this UPS Store has been closing at 7:00 p.m. Monday through Friday for at least the past 4 years.  You are mistaken about this UPS Store closing at 6:30 p.m. The only time we have ever close early is if a severe storm would put our employees at risk when traveling home, which is very rare.  We are open 9:00 am to 5:00 p.m. on Saturday and we are closed on Sunday.  I would like to give you the opportunity to reach out to one of the owner's and/or consider revising your review.  Thank You for your attention to this matter.  Owners, The UPS Store.

name: Mike Pritchett
text: No idea what customer service means.

name: David Pham
text:
(Translated by Google) Cute and attentive staff will have free mailing warehouse via usps. Glad I dislike

(Original)
Nhân viên dễ thương chu đáo bạn sẽ được miễn phí kho gửi thư hộ qua cổng usps. Vui lắm tôi thất thích

resp.text:
(Translated by Google) Thank you sir. Please visit us again soon.

Thank you dear Sir. Please visit us again soon.

(Original)
Xin cảm ơn Ngài. Hãy ghé thăm chúng tôi một lần nữa sớm.

Thank you kindly Sir.  Please visit us again soon.

name: Marshal Conover
text: Like watching a glacier melt in the antarctic. The packages take forever to get sorted and marked for pickup. If your package was "delivered" to the post office, then come back 48 hrs to pick it up. They need to develop a faster mechanism to sort mail. I have a feeling they haven't changed the process since the base opened in 1910.

name: kap kim
text: Maxwell Air Force Base is blessed to have this postal station on base. More over, we are lucky to have Shelia there. I always find reasons to ship things off because it's such a treat to just exchange pleasantries with her. Though we are going through tough times, she has made sure each and every package I have brought there (there have been hundreds) made it out expeditiously. kk

name: 2HOT Tray3415
text: It is absolutely incredible how poorly run the post office is now. The amount of packages that aren't delivered because the delivery person is beyond lazy or incompetent amazes me. This particular branch is horrible. Good luck getting your package on time or even delivered. Even when they mark it as delivered, it likely won't be. Putting the apartment lockbox key in the wrong mailbox, or straight up not putting the key in the mailbox. It is pathetic. And people really want the government to run more things in our lives.

name: Christopher Walker
text: I have no idea why Sheila has been rated so badly. She the nicest person every time I come in. She is also very good at her job and always tells me the best mailing approach to get my letter or package to its destination on time at the best rate.
