The reason she is not typically at the counter is because she is “one deep” and has to work in the back to get all of the packages ready for mailing and sort through incoming mail. Just ring the bell like she asks on her sign and she will come right out. She is awesome and is warm and cheerful and very competent.

name: Hailey McNaughton
text: My husband was stationed there for OTS. Long story short we moved and are trying to reach the PO as they have a package of ours that we need. NO ONE ANSWERS THE PHONES. Day three and still no one has answered.

name: Diane SAMs
text: This is my favorite post office location in Montgomery.  Sheila is always pleasant and helpful to all patrons.  I live close to another post office location and gladly drive further to use the Maxwell AFB location.

name: House Of Beauty by Wabanoonkwe
text: The WORST customer service ever! Not only has she (older Caucasian lady with grey hair) humiliates me EVERY TIME I’ve gone in , she Complains EVERY TIME I send a package over seas! Then she makes a public announcement to let everyone in line know that it wouldn’t be so long if it wasn’t for my packages. It’s embarrassing and disgusting. I CANT BELIEVE I had to leave “1” star cause it should be a negative star. I truly tried to have my opinion instead of listening to the online reviews, but I truly feel thier frustration with the poor service at this USPS office.

name: Jorge Serafin
text: I would give a zero if that was an option: Went at 2PM as opening hours stated. 2PM comes and goes and nobody opens. 2:10 comes and goes and nobody opens. At 2:13 a postal employee comes out and informs the line of customers that it will be another 10 minutes before they open. I took my package and went to UPS, last time I try to use our postal service.

name: Matthew Brew
text: Older lady that works the front desk is generally not there and when she is you will very much be on her time table when waiting for or receiving service. One time, after shuffling around in the back for a while looking for someone's lost package, she finally arrived to the service desk just to tell us all she had to go to the bathroom. Couldn't make this up, but shes probably been doing this most her adult life and is nearing retirement. Which is also probably why she came off as rude and condescending every one of my three visits to send a few bank documents. Would have loved to save time/not working with her if my bank didn't need the paper copies...there's a reason people don't use/want to use USPS. The one star/benefit is that it is on base...although closed from 1-2 and always on the weekends..

name: Austin Mattley
text:
Worst post office I have ever visited. They constantly neglect to leave slips in the P.O. Boxes, give out the wrong packages, skip delivery days whenever they want, and the one lady is always rude and never tries help.

Horrible excuse for a post office. I use UPS and FedEx whenever possible.

name: Aaron Bradley
text: I believe the ladies name is Shelia... she is always rude and passively aggressive to customers. It's inappropriate and embarrassing how she treats military members.

name: Tiffany 334
text: Horrible service!!!!

name: Celeste
text: Disrespectful.

name: Jeannine Lewis
text: Put the right number, not no 1800 number!

name: Sean Abernathy
text: It's rarely open, and if you have an issue, there is no direct number to be found for this branch and the worst automated system ever created!

name: Neophyter *
text:
Service is kind and helpful.
Buy a very large mailbox if you have a Amazon Prime membership.

name: White Raven#5477
text: My mail carrier insists on putting mail that doesn't belong in my box in my box. I have repeatedly put it back in the return mail and she repeatedly puts it back in my box I'm sick of it.

name: LaceyRae Sport Visintainer
text: The UPS Store #3677 on Greensprings is the best one around! Their staff is so helpful and always kind. They treat every order as a priority no matter how small. From print projects, work projects, mailers, Christmas Cards, and everything in between, they do great work. I use them for personal printing and also for work. They pick up the phone to talk through my questions or specifics on any order, and always have a solution. I am very thankful for this store and crew!

resp.text:
LaceyRae,
Thank you for your review.

name: Pandalovebutton
text: Incredibly helpful and kind personnel.

name: Stephanie R. Tinney
text: The absolute best people you’d ever want to deal with.  They are also very knowledgeable and friendly .  I have to go there at least once a week and never have I received anything less than perfect service

resp.text:
Stephanie,

Thank you for your review.

name: Krystal Hughes
text: The group here were very helpful! Even while busy they managed to make everyone feel welcomed and Mark even offered to drop my usps mail in their drop box! Above and veyond services!

resp.text:
Krystal,

Thank you for the review!

name: O. Shanta
text: Friendly & professional  service and clean environment. They are located in Edgemont Town Center next to Publix

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind review.

Sincerely,

Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: Natty Pooh
text:
Customer Service is Outstanding
Every Employee Great Job

resp.text:
Thank you for the review and for your business.

Mark - Manager

name: Alex Townley
text: I searched "food near me" on Google maps and this showed up with a label instead of the two actual food spots near it. Not food. What the hell.

resp.text:
Alex,
Thank you for the review.  This seems like an issue with google and not our store as no where does our store list "food" as listed services.  I would reach out to google to see why they have this listing incorrect.

name: Lauren Weekley
text: Fantastic printing! Great staff, very knowledgeable and helpful, with good communication and wonderful customer service. My high quality prints were completed quickly and with no issues. I highly recommend this store for any of your print needs! Especially wide format things: banners, canvas, etc.

resp.text:
Thank you for your kind review.

Mark - Manager

name: Carole Singleton
text: Always professional. Very helpful and accomodating.

name: James Odom
text: We needed a sign made really quickly. We were able to email the store with the files late afternoon and was able to pick up the sign the next morning. Sign looks great, it was quick and the price was very afforadable.

resp.text:
James,

Thank you for your kind review.

Sincerely,
Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: William McGroarty
text: The employees are always friendly and willing to help with whatever you need!

name: Paul Emanuel
text: Always a quick in and quick out.

name: Kyle Taylor
text: These people are genuinely nice and helpful. I have a mail box there and stop in often. Always smiling faces. No one is perfect but I feel comfortable working with this team.

resp.text:
Thank you for the kind review.

Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: Lori O'Keefe
text: I recently had worked with the UPS store here in Homewood, AL on a project with a client of mine. They did such an excellent job helping us get organized for a big home show at the very last minute. I can't say enough great things about their care and attention to their customers and local businesses they work with. I would highly recommend using them for any of your projects, mailing or shipping needs.

name: Garrett Hester
text: I've never had a bad experience at this place. The staff has a good customer service attitude, they're always prompt to provide assistance, and I never feel like I'm a bother to them. They seem genuinely eager to help. Recommended.

name: Renee Page
text: No consideration for customers.  Not well managed.  Disrespectful and inefficient.

resp.text:
Thank you for your review.  Without specifics it is hard to respond to see how we could have made your visit more efficient and acceptable.

Sincerely,
Mark Berthiaume
Manager

name: Juan
text: Got a weird racist vibe from here. I was waiting for like 5 min in the front of the store (store was empty) to drop a few boxes then a worker walked by and looked me dead in the eye and said nothing just walked to the back of the store.(probably cuz I was speaking Spanish lol )  If it wasn’t for the young man that works in front I would never come back.. too bad he wasn’t there today. He’s the only reason I gave this review 2 stars

resp.text:
Juan,
I'm sorry you had a bad experience at our store.  We do our best to make every customer's experience a good one.   I can assure you there is no problem with you speaking Spanish.  We do our best to have an employee working who can speak Spanish as much as possible, as we have a number of customers who would prefer to complete their transaction in Spanish.
Sincerley,
Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: Frank Burchfield
text: This place just tried to charge me $5 to run off 1 black and white piece of paper. My biggest mistake was coming period. This is exactly why UPS continues to be a joke!

resp.text:
Mr. Burchfield:  I'm sorry your experience did not meet your expectations.  When you were in and said you wanted to email us a document to print, I asked how many pages (1) and if it was black and white (yes).  I offered you a $2 alternative to the email, which was to log on to our wi-fi, and print the document to our wi-fi printer instead of the $5 email charge.

Sincerley,
Mark Berthiaume
Manager

name: Brielle Deloris
text: When I entered the facility the staff seemed apprehensive to help customers who walked through the doors. I sent a package overnight for next day delivery and my package was never sent from this specific location although this is the location I took my package too. I paid for overnight service for something that was never sent and I had to open and investigation for my package. I’m disappointed in my first and last experience with UPS. I’ll stick to FEDEX.

resp.text:
I don't show a shipment from our UPS Store with the name of Brielle Deloris.  Could you supply me with the tracking number so I can research the shipment in question.  There is one NDA shipment sent recently that a customer came into our store to ask some questions about.  I'm not sure if that is the shipment you are referencing or not, but I would be glad to have a dialogue with you regarding your shipment.
Sincerely,
Mark Berthiaume - Manager

name: David Rogers
text: They provide great service for printing. I send them a file that I need 100 copies printed and cut and almost always they are done by the end of the business day. Absolutely great service.

name: Isabel Medina
text: Ive printed a lot of my restaurant's manus and promotions with this store. They always do a great job!

name: Londa Wren
text: Great staff always friendly!!

name: Marie E
text: There was only one employee. The line and wait were far beyond reasonable! The one employee, a tall bald man, was extremely rude. I had a passport appointment, and he used his phone during the time he was taking my picture. Also, he was hasty and rushed me. He did not mention or suggest anything about priority or express mail or insurance. He lost my application at one point during the process. He told me to write on the form to correct it, when the dept. of state explicitly says NOT to write on the form. When I told him that, he said something to the effect of, "Trust me, I've been doing this for years, and I took the all day class. I know what I'm doing." With a sharp tongue. My application never made it to the dept., and it is now lost with my original birth certificate and a check I had to pay to void, with no way to track it's whereabouts. Absolutely horrible. Id give them -5 stars if I could.

name: George William
text: I’ve lived all over the country. This post office is the absolute worst ever. Soooooooo slow and the employees are clueless. I can only imagine the sight if these workers had jobs where they had to produce. They also need to update their posted hours. I was here on a Saturday right after 8:30 because online it states 8:30. However their window shows 9:00 and of course they didn’t unlock the door until EXACTLY 9:00 in spite of a line waiting outside.

name: Reme lopes
text:
Positive this place is stealing packages
I’ve had two packages say attempted deliver but that they didn’t have access to my apartment building
For three days in a row now, my packages are gone.

My apartment building is never locked and doesn’t even have a lock on it.
Today Saturday was their “ attempted re delivery “ for all of my packages ( sep order)
And no one even showed up.
Also yay me it’s Saturday they said they re delivered around 7 pm which is coincidental that tomorrow they are closed and already closed today.

I will be calling to people above them, to get this area reported.

name: jeffrey mathis
text: Our residence, 3257 Monte Doro Dr, 35216 has had no delivery of mail since Wed., June 2 through Sat., June 5. That's 4 days. I will attempt to be in someone's ear about this.

name: Paul Goodall (PrincePaul)
text:
I scheduled a passport appointment on 1/21/2021.  The appointment was confirmed to take place at 10:00am on 1/26/2021.  I arrived 10 minutes early on the 26th as directed and was informed that... "The guy who does passports isn't here today.  He said he was going to call everyone who had an appointment and let them know.  They called me to come open the store.  I'm not even supposed to be here.  You can wait if you want but usually if he was coming in, he would already be here."

Obviously, I left.

I had to leave work for this appointment and now I'll have to leave again on the 28th... to go to a different location, of course.  You may rest assured I received no call from this man.  You may also rest assured that this place deserves even less than the 1.9 stars they have earned for themselves.

name: Kirsten Ratza
text: I am quite frustrated with this post office. I had a package marked as delivered that never appeared at my home. Now, three weeks later, the same thing has happened again. Another package is marked as delivered but has not appeared.  What is happening to this service?  I would rather have slower but accurate service then missing mail.  Please, if someone of any authority reads this, figure out what is happening to this vital service! We rely on you to do good work.

name: notthebeesxoxo
text: Slow with usually only one person working the entire office. If they are tied up doing passports, they will tell you they can't help you. They have lines out the door of people with one person working always. They will also set out hand written signs that say they will be back later, leaving the doors unlocked and the office completely open with no one in it.

name: Kristen W.
text: I was wary of visiting because all the reviews are bad but it was a good experience. There was a line but Lakita was pleasant and efficient.

name: peter rambin
text: Amazon package not delivered for no apparent reason. Just says held at location and gives me the address for the vestavia post office. Obviously I'm already frustrated since I paid for delivery. I go there and ask if my package is there and the man working very rudely starts cutting me off and telling me I don't have a p.o. box there he doesn't have my package and that it's at green springs location. That's fine and dandy, but could he not tell me nicely it, even in a neutral tone? Why did it set this guy off and why could he not conduct himself like an adult to tell me this? He also appeared to have a nicer shirt in than the other employee as if he might be in charge/the manager which is insane given how he acted like a child. Based on these reviews I'm not alone with incredibly incompetent and rude staff.

name: Kenneth Carden
text: Lazy. The bald guy here will cut corners if he can. Make them verify the address sent and also just go to another post office.

name: William Sellers
text: I don’t even review places but I had to leave this 1 star after my experience today.

name: jacob g
text: Declined service at 3:30 on a monday when no else was in store.

name: Melanie Taylor - Coleman
text: In and out in 5 minutes or less. The service was fine. Others complain about the long line. The newer post offices are much bigger. This little place can’t help but have a line. My issues is the building. This location is very old and dark. The location can also be hard to get in and out.

name: JIll Billions
text: This post office is unfortunately the slowest post office ever. The same employees have been there for ages and take their sweet time no matter how long the line is. Occasionally they’ll get a new or temp worker that is smiley and more proficient which is a breath of fresh air. I absolutely dread this post office and often drive farther to a different one. I’ve also mailed cards directly from here that were local and took over 2 weeks to arrive.

name: Jessica Gunter
text: Wouldn't make a copy of change of address to enroll a student as proof of address change for the new school ... school told me that the post office did actually what i needed went to a another post office and got what was needed for the school .... when they told me it would be 10 to 15 business days

name: Jenna Willoughby
text: Very disappointed with my attempted visits here. I had a passport appointment at 10:00 am (first appointment of the day) and when I came in they said all passport appointments had been canceled. She said they called everyone but I did not have a missed call. I scheduled an appointment for another day at 10:00 am. I went in and the man said they canceled all passport appointments again!! I did not have any missed calls, and the night before I received confirmations of my appointment. Not coming back.

name: Matt Burke
text: Friendly but not enough employees especially when they’re the busiest—during lunch hours.  Line is regularly out the door with only 1 employee at the register.

name: Jesse Carter
text: I was 5 min late for a passport appointment after driving 40 min away and having to wait in traffic. She said after 3 min your late and I can't help you. Like exceptions can't be made over 2 min? The past 3 usps ive been too have had awful service. Its like they hire way underqualified people to work there that don't understand what line of work they are in. The answer is customer service by the way. They need to take some training courses to learn how to service people. Mcdonalds has better customer service.

name: Shaun Thomas
text: I called because a package was attempted for delivery to my business and a "notice" was supposedly left because we were closed. There was no notice to be found, and the carrier did not show up the next day to redeliver. The phone number online is a fax line, so no luck calling to get anyone on the line to explain. I've had other similar experiences here in person where employees couldn't be any less concerned with helping customers. I also have had packages taken without being given tracking information after asking for it. Hate having to deal with this office.

name: Adaryl Mines
text: One of the letter carriers rear ended my car not paying attention at a stop light. It's going on 2months and they still haven't called me or my insurance agent back about the repairs my car needs. When you call all you get is the run around and directed to a claims lady that is never in her office nor does she return phone calls.

name: Nikki Aaron
text: A family had an appointment to get passports. Instead of having two desk workers to cover the appointment and regular business, these morons sent the second employee on a long break. So a long line of customers had to wait and wait to get our business handled. I'm so glad we spend all our tax revenue on war instead of on making the government run smoothly.

name: Katie R
text:
I have never used this post office location, as it is not really near my home or work but it was convenient to me yesterday to purchase stamps and mail my Christmas Cards.  This location was by far the most personable I have been to in many many visits.  There was a line out the door but the two clerks working the registers stayed calm and friendly the entire time, even when the system went down and quit taking credit/debit cards.  They were friendly and patient and it was truly a nice experience despite the wait in line.  They were efficient and methodical as well.  Often times at other locations I feel as though the clerks are attempting to see just how SLOWLY they can process everybody in line.

Job well done, despite your location not being convenient to me, I wouldn't mind making the drive just to have this good of service from a postal service office.

name: Stina Journey
text: I tried calling about getting a passport and the lady didn't even care. I am new to the area and didn't know about the walk-in building. I had to ask her about the address for the walk-in building and she quickly told me. I asked about the times they were opened. She quickly told me with a very bad "I'm better than you" voice and hung up. I didn't even get to ask about the application or what forms of ID I needed to bring. I'm definitely not calling back or wanting to be a customer.

name: Seble abadi
text: Worst place to do business at. The staffs are horrible. It’s a place you wouldn’t want to go back again!

name: Marcus Ross
text: Slowest. Post Office. Ever.

name: Christian Mays
text: This post office and the post office downtown were rated some of the United States fastest post offices. Heck yes. My packages have never been late. It's pretty incredible.

name: Jermaine Watkins
text: Took forever to get on the phone & when answered was rushed to get off. Tried to pass me off to the main office several times. I recommend going to the UAB location. They were very nice AND efficient

name: Arnold Servo
text: The single worst experience I had at an USPS office!  I was "served" by Mrs. Joanne Simmons.  It became evident pretty quickly that this lady couldn't care less about working at this office or to fulfill the most minimal and basic duties this government paid job requires.  Admittedly, there might be other great service providers / employees at this facility, but the fact that the disrespectful and incompetent behavior of a person like Joanne Simmons is tolerated there, makes me doubt that this is the case.

name: Richard McCallum
text: Plan to wait at least 10 to 30 minutes if you need to see someone at the counter. You would figure that they would have full staff on busy days like April and October 15th. It seems like every time that their is a deadline, the line is out the door and there is only one person at the counter.

name: Daniel Ford
text: Going to the post office is never fun, but it's not their fault that the lines are long. I've never had anything other than a positive experience here, and I ship packages for my business regularly

name: Tiffany Roberts
text: This is the slowest post office anywhere around. There's only ever 1 cashier and a ton of people in line. It's worth the hassle to just drive to Hoover where they actually have multiple employees and it doesn't take 20 minutes to mail a single package.

name: Dee X
text: Went there around 10am. Line wasn't too long so that wasn't bad, but one of the employees was rushed and rude to the customers that were ahead of me.

name: Sharon Worcester
text: Been twice. First time the doors were locked more than 5 min before closing. Second time I made it at 10 min til closing and a man at the counter rudely said I had 3 min and should probably just come back in the morning. There won't be a third time.

name: Wrath
text: Several post office locations nearby. Do not go to this one. You will regret it.

name: Tommy Norton
text: I would rather go to a dog fight than to the USPS.

name: Robert Evans
text: Not very friendly. Act like you need an appointment to get a stamp.

name: Rebekah Eckard
text: Slowest post office ever. 5 customers. 2 employees. 20 minutes.

name: Gary Grimes
text: Typical post office

name: Stephanie Sprouse
text: Friendly service

name: Kat Paay
text: If I could give 0 stars I would. This post office lost my engagement ring. A custom, quite expensive, engagement ring, which I was assured would not only be expedited but also insured. If you are shipping anything of any value, or need something to you in any kind of specific time frame just go ahead and go with UPS and Fedex, at least they don't lose your insured valuables and then tell you they hope they find it but there's no guarantee. I guess at the very least the staff has been apologetic and the mail lady that runs our route is super nice, but beyond that I cannot even fathom the dysfunction and chaos these people must work in.

name: Jenny White
text: I have a P.O. box here and most of the time the workers are okay and helpful, but they can be rude when asked about packages or if something has arrived yet. One experience I had, I asked if a package had been delivered and instead of checking they asked of I had a tracking number (which I didn't) and then I was told I cant pick it up unless there is a slip in the box and refused to check if the package had in fact come. Recently I went there with a tracking number saying my package had arrived earlier that morning and provided them with the number and screen that showed it was delivered. They confirmed it had been dropped off, but they would only tell me that they "hadn't got to it yet" and couldn't give me a definitive answer on when I would be able to pick it up, only "maybe we will get to it this evening" and didnt give me my package. (Which is honestly really inconvenient for people who don't always have enough time to stop by the post office during their operating hours) Hopefully this location can make some changes better their organization skills  and attitude of the workers.

name: Gary Ewing
text: Pretty sure someone up there is stealing my mail. We will get to the bottom of it or there will be a lawsuit. I’m done. Y’all have no respect for the fact that some mail is important and needs to be recieved. Instead y’all take what you want and it never gets delivered but y’all can’t be bothered to even try to find out where it went.

name: CrownedSoV
text: Today I found some of my mail in the mailbox and the rest in the street by the mailbox. I believe the carrier dropped some of the mail as it was being put into my mailbox and didn't bother to get out of the mail truck to put it in the box with the rest of it. The mail that was left in the street could have been lost or stolen; not the first time I've had issues....I filed a complaint via the USPS website.

name: R. Griffin
text: Poorly managed post office station.  Twice already this year (as of 7/20) my mail carrier has informed me that the Troy, AL post office is out of first class (letter) stamps!  How does this happen except for poor management?  In addition, the few times I've been in the facility, the customer service is marginal at best.

name: Meeks Sweets MekaFay
text: Horrible. The lady named Jane is very unprofessional and has a bad attitude. I simply went to pick up packages from there. This ordeal turned into about 20-30 minutes of her telling me they were not there when she didn’t look. FINALLY, she went again and came back with package and a stack of mail she said I did NOT have. Don’t waste your time with her.

name: Serena Z
text: The lady at the front desk helped me contact the driver and retrieved my package that was delivered to the wrong address. Very helpful and professional customer service.

name: anna glover
text: Poorly managed post office station.  Staff is very rude!!

name: Jane Doe
text: I was given two different instructions on how to write addresses on a change of address slip. I got back in line 3 times and saw a different clerk when i’d Get up to the front and was told i’d filled it out incorrectly. She was rude about my hand writing on the form and all around unpleasant. It took me 45 minutes to fill out a change of address form because she’d Send me to the back of the line. When I was 2nd in line for the 3rd time, the clerk told a lady who’d been sent to the back of the line to fix her package slip that she could go in front of me and that she didn’t have to wait in line. I politely mentioned that I wished she’d said something to me about not having to wait again after making minor adjustments to the form and she said, “she forgot”. I’ve seen anything so unprofessional.

name: SarahElizabeth Richards
text: Never had any issues

name: jill strickland
text: Don't even try to get them on the phone!

name: Matthew Brodhead
text: I asked the lady if I could buy a few stamps. Her reply was, "obviously". Horred customer service.

name: Hoàng Nhật Anh
text: Bad Customer Service. I want pick up my package early a day before it delivery. My tracking number show it arrived in post office. I came to pick up my package . They said i can't pick up until they leave a note in my mailbox ? Event i can prove that my package with my id and tracking number.

name: BlueLine Bassing
text: Have no regard for customers packages

name: Alex Weith
text: HORRIBLE HORRIBLE customer service

name: Adaria Holland
text: Carrier said my address was invalid . Called post office they said it would be redelivered , next day , no package . After calling for hours I finally got an answer for her to say she will tell the carrier to leave it at the office so I can pick it up. Get there it’s no package. Carrier hasn’t saw the package! They need better customer service and carriers that will deliver packages to your home if it won’t fit in the box ! 😡

name: William White
text: Do you want your package lost or damaged. So you not want to receive tour package at all. Do you enjoy calling for endless hours with no answer. Then this is the post office to use. If I could give a negative 5 star review I would.

name: Aries Diamond
text: My mail was sent here according to my tracking status. When I got there, I was told that my mail was delivered there on April 1st, 2021 but someone was gonna send my mail to my PO Box which is at UPS Store in Opelika. Then I was told that they do not deliver to PO boxes and they claimed they didn't have my mail anymore. This is all just a headache, I need my mail! Those were important papers being sent to me pertaining to my vehicle!

name: hashirama senju
text: I wish there was a negative rating. The customer service is awful.

name: Sylvia Rogers
text: My package was misdelivered and I called to report it.  A very nice lady answered the phone and called me back to report that they would redeliver in one day.  :)

name: Neil Sasser
text: Was told I had to buy a roll of tape to put on a prepaid label. Meanwhile, the young lady behind me was offered tape for her box. I looked at the clerk and looked at the young lady. The clerk said I see you looking but we don’t have tape for you.............wow

name: Jasmine Chang
text: The staff is always nice and helpful! I had to return a mail to sender and they had no problem doing that for me. Keep it up!

name: David Shaw
text: Incredibly personal profession service that I have never received from any PO across the world. Always a pleasure going there. Thank you all  and happy new year for 2020.

name: Austin Davis
text: Awful just awful. Try calling them and have fun talking to a robot for hours.

name: Hunter Smith
text: The number they have to call is only a machine, they sent my package back to the sender because they thought for some reason no one lived in my apartment.

name: Rachel Caswell
text: Terrible customer service and I'm not saying it's completely Opelika's fault but it's definitely a USPS problem. I'm 4 days behind on receiving a package and the tracking info hasn't even been updated. I can't get in contact with any of the 'diligent' employees up there either because no one answers the phone. Would say I'm let down but after years of this kind of service, it's come to be expected.

name: T Potts
text: Very nice facility. Easy access and friendly staff.

name: Julie Gibson
text: I cannot praise the Opelika Post Office high enough.  If there was a 10 star rating they would get all 10 stars.  The folks in the post office are fabulous, courteous and very helpful.  I worked for a company that did not have a mail box on the property, we had only a PO Box.  When folks would send something to the street address it would end up in my PO Box.  How is that for service??  These folks go the second mile.  My mail carriers who have been assigned to our home route are also exceptional people.  They walk the extra steps to put my packages in my carport to protect them from weather and porch pirates. Kudos the the entire staff of the Opelika Post Office.

name: Ms .meka Buck
text: Great staff love them all & Mrs Darcel  very nice  & Flex  keep me laughing  great people this get a 5 star ❤❤❤

name: Claudette Hendrix
text: Close before 5. Just an FYI. Staff ok normally

name: Madelyn Weaver
text: I love everything about The Opelika USPS. Darcel is always happy! And my mail lady never ever seems to have a bad day! Rain or shine she is smiling!!!!!

name: Braxton Hunsberger
text: Mail is never on time or delivered to the wrong house. Sent a package to several post offices around me after it had already gotten to my local office and ended up getting to me 2 days after expected delivery.

name: Rob Still
text: I had a package for delivery today, and realized that I had accidentally set the delivery address for my office instead of my home. No big deal, I'll just wait up at the office and get some work done near the door until they come to deliver my package. I waited 3 hours for my package, and then get a notification that it was undeliverable. They did not attempt to deliver my package.

name: Michelle
text: Lisa at the Opelika post office totally saved my day with my package!!! THANK YOU LISA :)

name: Polly Nix
text: The post office is the best! More fun than Disney world!

name: timmy chance
text: Live in Opelika and there's no regular mail carrier , different ones and runs late every day, thanks for poor service

name: Kayla Fitzgerald
text: Excellent service!  I called with tracking # in advance of live animal delivery and they called me when my chicks arrived. 100% survived. Thanks opelika post office!

name: Steve Salo
text: Always get great service from friendly staff.  I made a mistake of ordering stamps by mail and s week later I have not received them.

name: shauna marshall
text: Never get mail on time. I have caught the mail man sleeping under a tree and I am sick and tired of them not doing there job. Its ridiculous

name: Tonya Banks
text: Always friendly & helpful staff!

name: Harry A
text: Dumb-As-Dirt Sunday USPS carriers won't put mail in my mailbox.

name: Lakeshia Pendleton
text: Ok

name: Blair Winfield
text:
I guess the days of courteous behavior is gone when Sharon is not there and since Sarah has retired.

There are two women in there at the counter who are the most rude and obnoxious people. I don't think it's right for them to behave that way when people.go in there and spend their money to send cards off to loved ones for the holidays. It doesn't matter what day it is or what it's for. They do not have the right to treat people horrible or ruin their day. They need to rethink their attitudes or  go find another job that does not require talking to patrons.

name: Jacob Warden
text:
Hey, I was in there today around 4:30 April 10th. Firstly. I'm sorry if I was out of place with anything I said while I was in there, I wasn't  trying to make the situation worse at all....
Secondly,  your whole staff is incredible.  You are all very nice and kind and helpful. I just hope I didnt make the situation worse with anything I said.  I know you all try your best every day and it shows! Thank you for your kind service to the oneonta community!

name: Heather Reeves
text: Only because one is an option. I mailed a package on the 14th of feburary and it's still siting at the post office at this time. I really dont recommend going here.

name: Lela Dailey
text:
The staff is excellent and knowledgeable.
I've never had any problem with them
and we've had a box there for many, many years.

name: homesteader fifty w/ ricky & martha
text: Thank you ,ladies  for sesrching high and low for our package ..

name: Kate Lucille
text: I had called to check on a package that they are supposed to receive soon and they were very sweet and quick about everything

name: Neil Putman
text: THE PEOPLE IN POST OFFICE  IN ONEONTA AL ARE REAL NICE THAT IS WHAT MAKES  A REAl Great post office friendly faces always good .so good to you  it's like 0 so good BarBQ its so good to see some being good to you.you it makes you to want back and buy their steamps or say Hi How you doing you go to out for a veggie pizza at pizza Hut

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: Very helpful staff. Unlike most of the offices I have visited.

name: Chris Mahan
text: Very professional and helpful.

name: Mary Chappell
text: Very helpful and nice.

name: Serity Veritas
text: Scott was attentive, responsive and expedient. I would recommend for any who have computer issues.

resp.text: Thank you Serity for the positive feedback and I look forward to your next visit here at Scott's Computer Services, Oneonta, AL.

name: STEPHEN DAVIS
text: Very professional. Helpful. Recommend this place

resp.text: Thank you Stephen for the positive feedback and I look forward to your next visit here at Scott's Computer Services, Oneonta, AL.

name: Tara Parker
text: scott is extremely nice to do business with it

resp.text: Thank you Tara for the positive feedback and I look forward to your next visit here at Scott's Computer Services, Oneonta, AL.

name: Debbie Bilen
text: We had to use the Fedex shipping here. Scott was very friendly and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you Debbie for the positive feedback and I look forward to your next visit here at Scott's Computer Services, Oneonta, AL.

name: Jacque Hagood
text: Nice guy who runs it, he was very helpful.

resp.text: Thank you Jacque.  It was also nice to meet you and I look forward to your next visit here at Scott's Computer Services, Oneonta, AL.

name: Tom Windsor
text: Keith and his staff are top notch. Outstanding customer service. No need to look anywhere else for all of your printing and shipping needs. They even have a convenient notary public service that I have personally used. Keep up the great work!

name: P F (Passiflora)
text: They are a great local business-copied my blueprints with skill and courtesy. When first set was too light they repeated until I was satisfied. Work was done quickly and efficiently while I waited. Cost was reasonable also.

resp.text: Thank you, PF, for your kind words.  We work hard to make sure our customers are satisfied with both the product and service they receive at our store.  Your experience is a testimony to the excellent employees we have - we hope to see you again in the near future.  Keith

name: Mary Sue Fortner
text: I received a package ordered from Amazon that was open and only 1 item in it when I had ordered 2. It was Closys mouthwash. The UPS store was not responsible for this.  They’re store is only for drop offs.  They are very kind and helpful.

resp.text: Hi Ms. Fortner.  Please contact my store to discuss your package.  Was it delivered direct to your home by UPS or was it picked up at my store?  We will be happy to get you to the right people to discuss.  205-980-8180, Keith

name: Melissa Dixon
text: Keith Sides and his employees are fantastic. I use them for all of my mailing needs, fingerprinting, and greeting card purchases. I'm always greeted by a smiling face, and the services is worth more than five stars.

name: JohnnyBee Goode
text: Had the pleasure of spending almost one hpur speaking with Keith, the Owner of this UPS Store tonight. I arrived as the clock struck 6:30 pm (Closing Time) to pick up some print media for our Bakery, as someone outsourced our Order and I had no idea what to expect re: the finished product. Mr. Sides was laid back, personable and our product looks fantastic. He not only won my business moving forward but I will be using Keith and this (specific) UPS Store (although it is a good 20-25 minutes outside of the way) in the future for custom orders relative to our Brand. A+

name: Lavon Chaney
text: I had a commissioned painting I needed shipped to my sister in NC.  The crew at Caldwell Mill UPS Store took great care in packaging the painting and it arrived in tact and exactly on time.  The little extra it may cost to ship ANYTHING via UPS vs. the US Postal system is totally worth it.  Highly recommend this store!!

name: Cameron McKinley
text: This is my favorite UPS Store and I will drive out of my way to go here because of the great customer service. Zared, the front counter manager, is amazing. She is efficient, friendly, knowledgeable, and a problem-solver. I am always in and out quickly and everything ships as planned. Thank you for your commitment to the community!

resp.text: Cameron....thank you very much for your kind review and for being a loyal customer.  We try to make sure every customer feels unique and that we always provide excellent service.  Zared, and the rest of her team at the front counter, work hard and do an awesome job!  Keith

name: Shawn Troughton
text:
Love Keith and everyone at this UPS Location. There is no better place to go.
We use them to ship and print for our business as well as personal use.

name: RRozsa
text: I love this place.  They are friendly, helpful, and efficient!  Mailing a package is never a hassle, and ithe store is in a very convenient location -- easy to get in and out of quickly.

name: Andy Entrekin
text: Friendly and knowledgeable staff. They took care of me!

name: Leslie Cremer
text: The best place to go for shipping needs!  The people here are always nice and willing to help. If I ever got to the point where I lived farther away I would drive all that way to get there.

resp.text: Leslie...I apologize for the late response but we certainly appreciate your vote of confidence.  Our counter staff works hard to provide excellent service each and every day.  Please, if you ever do move further away, always come back to see us.  Keith

name: Ella Fulcher
text: I had some plates that got shattered during shipment and a package that got labeled wrong.  I called the store and spoke with Zared who looked into my shipment and helped me return the wrong package and is working on getting me refunded for the plates.  Zared has been super helpful and sweet as we work through getting things processed and together.

resp.text: Ella....Thank you for your kind words about the service provided by Zared.  She and all our staff have the goal of providing the best in customer service.  While accidents do happen, we are always ready and willing to do whatever it takes to make it right.

name: Glenn Mazer
text: I could not submit another review so I'm editing a previous one to respond to Gabriel's review left a few days ago because it is not indicative of the UPS Store, the staff, or it's owner. She writes, "What good is the UPS store if I can’t ship postal packages.. just one more inconvenience because people can’t do their jobs right!!!" This review needs to be directed to the USPS, not the UPS store, she named the wrong entity in her review. She is correct about people not doing their job because that's the very reason the UPS store stopped taking prepaid USPS packages, because the USPS can't do their job. They lose packages, packages are delayed because they can't do their job and the UPS store should not have to take the blame for the USPS inadequate culture. So guess what? They don't have to take any more of the blame because they can't provide an accommodation for a service that is so inept in which they get blamed for. I am in this store just about everyday to get my mail. Regardless of how busy the staff is, I’m always treated with, “hello Mr. Mazer.” Zared and her crew are the most dedicated, service oriented people I’ve ever encountered. They get bombarded with shipping and packaging around this time of year, but they don’t change their demeanor. Keith, the owner, is a great guy and it’s no wonder why he has great people working for him. It is because he knows how to treat people and how people want to be treated. For that person that upgraded her one star to three stars, shame on you for blaming these fine folks for your ignorance.

resp.text: Glenn....always a pleasure to see you and thank you for your kind words.  I am blessed with good people whose goal is always to help our customers whether it be shipping, printing or any other of our business services.  If ever we fail to live up to your expectations - let me know - we'll make it right!  Keith

name: Jennifer Henshaw
text: Devon is an amazing employee! She stayed late to help me out and is very quick with her job! I think that's how she spelled her name but didn't get a good look. 10/10 for her!

resp.text: Jennifer....Thank you for your kind comments regarding Devyn.  She, and all our staff, hope to provide the best in customer service.  We are here to be of help any time we can.

name: Bryan Kirkland
text: Victoria was very helpful and patient with my products that had to be shipped. It's not everyday a racing wheelchair with two sets of wheels are shipped but she handled it like a pro and beyond pleasant to talk to. She listened to what I explained to her about how to package the carbon fiber wheels so that they wouldn't  get damaged from the axel's touching one another. I was dreading the process but came out of it with a smile on my face.

name: Mary Waldman
text:
I was charged a $20 rush fee for a small photocopy print job I submitted the day before. When I questioned the charge, I was told that same day photocopying was considered a rush. I pointed out that I had submitted the job the day before - I'd called the shop to make sure the email had come through and the clerk said the copy shop had left early. The best the manager could do was a 15% discount on the rush fee. I asked where this policy was noted and the staff had to dig out a notebook page buried on a back counter (that didn't list the policy). I just checked the website and there's no mention of rush charges, or even print prices.
(Update: this review started as a 1-star but I have changed it to a 3-star based on the managers quick response and offer to ameliorate the situation.)

resp.text:
Good morning....thank you for your comments and I want to start off by apologizing for the confusion on the rush fee.  We had understood the items were needed by 4:30pm that day and, as such, a rush fee would normally apply for same day jobs handled by our print department.  My apologies that you did not receive a quote before we proceeded on the job which would have outlined all charges and requested your approval to proceed.

Because of our error and because we value each customer’s business and their satisfaction with our work, I want to offer a cash refund to you for the rush fee or a print credit to be used on a future job.  We hope to see you again and trust you will find our service level improved.

Keith Sides

name: Jamie White
text: Keith at the UPS store on Caldwell Mill Road does a terrific job! His employees are always friendly and fast. I would recommend you use THIS UPS store for all of your printing needs.

name: Daniel Gallegly
text:
Keith grew a beard. I thought he was in the witness protection program when I ran into him. But he looks sharp and distinguished with the new look.

He has a great local print and ship shop that always did a good job for us and their people behind the counter have great attitudes and are really helpful and nice.

Good turn around and design quality always looks good. Keith runs a tight ship even with a beard.

name: Johnny Carcioppolo
text: This is the place to go for your printing needs!!! Colby and Donna did an amazing job for me in a pinch. The price was right and the service was outstanding. We even had one small issue and without a second thought they took care of everything in record time. If you have printing needs and you want reliable, cost efficient, professional and friendly service this is where you need to go. I will certainly have them do much more of my printing now.

name: A Robin
text: The sign on the door says "We're open".  They closed early today at noon.  They are closed.  The Inverness location is still open and has regular business hours.

resp.text: Hi...I'm sorry we missed you.  As the virus epidemic unfolded we were attempting to adjust hours for the safety of our employees and convenience of our customers.  I'm glad our Inverness store was able to assist you.

name: Daniel Gallegly
text:
These people do a GREAT JOB. The owner, Keith, and his team are very professional, and I was pleasantly surprised at the many different services that they offer. This store also has a printing department, which has done a great job printing all of our materials. The quality of the graphic design is also very strong.

I highly recommend the UPS Store on Caldwell Mill Road!!

name: Christy McDonald
text: Colby Green at the UPS STORE on Caldwell Mill RD truly is awesome!  He makes everything so easy.  The quality and price is definitely better than anywhere I've checked.  I've used them for business cards, post card mailers, stationary, stickers and etc.  Give them a shot, you won't regret it!

name: Tessie Barrett
text: Colby and the guys at UPS are awesome! They have made name tags, yard signs, business cards (in an hours notice.... ). Truly amazing. I highly recommend them to anyone.  Also ask about their flyer mail outs! Good stuff.

name: Joshua Winn
text: Have printing, shipping, labeling, storage needs? Colby Green and all of the folks at Store 2389 are the best in the business! They can take care of your needs, and are great when it comes to answering all your questions. They really do a fantastic job. Could not recommend anyone in their line of work more highly!

name: Brice Jackson
text: I use Caldwell Mill UPS Store for my Print! They always do an excellent job in a timely manner! Staff is knowledgeable & helpful. They respond quickly to email and a delight to work with.

name: Woodie Westbrook
text: Great service, helpful staff.  The manager seemed very knowledgeable and was willing to work with me to help with a lot of last minute printing.  I couldn't recommend them a enough.  Any time I am in Birmingham this is where I will go.

name: Down In Front Productions LLC
text: The BEST printers in the area. They have helped us with numerous projects on a tight timeline and have more than satisfied us every single time! We highly recommend them!

name: Connie Johnston
text: As a local business owner, I highly recommend UPS Store 2389 for their advertising and printing services.  Their knowledgeable staff is friendly and very helpful.  The graphic designers are great to work with and the turnaround time is super quick. I used to order my printed products online, but now I exclusively use the UPS Store 2389.

name: Glyna Humm
text: I pass other UPS stores to come to this one! They have fantastic service and offer more printing services than the others. I love that I can email the job I need done and they do all the work. They always call me immediately when it is complete.

name: Nimes Dill
text: Same day business cards are awesome! Colby does a wonderful job getting you taken care of.

name: Joseph Hope
text: Great place to do business. They offer tons of helpful services!

name: RLK Designs, LLC
text: Sarah and Jessica are extremely talented graphic artists, and, more importantly, very nice ladies.  They are the reasons we love getting cards, prints, and signs at UPS Caldwell Mill.  Thank you!

name: Joseph Gray
text: The staff here always has a smile on. One in particular who always helps me out has a bright smile and her happy attitude is infectious.

resp.text: Thank you, sir, for you kind comments regarding our staff.  We always strive to provide efficient and friendly service.

name: Laura Gardner
text: This store makes sure to get the job done right and really knows how to take care of their customers! Colby is great to work with!

name: Cassidy Waddell
text: The employees are so polite and attentive. Customer service is top notch and store is very clean!

name: Fara Poe
text: Always fast service, no matter if it is shipping or copy services.  They even offered "consultation" for the best paper choice for my last copy/print job.

name: Jason Watson
text: Colby and the whole staff at this store will follow you throughout the process and put what you want where you want it. Great experience every time I go in the store.

name: Jason Hamer
text: They provide more services than what I thought. Great Store, Service and Staff!

name: Cheryl Ringuette Lewis
text: Terrific people, fast friendly service, this place just can't be beat!

name: Nicholas Johnson
text: Great staff always willing to help and they will work with you to make sure you are happy and return. That is hard to find now a days.

name: Tim Ryner
text: Great service and friendly staff. Would use their services again.

name: Linda
text: Rude!  Just looked at me when I came in. No can I help you are anything.  We just stood looking as each other. Rude. Bad customer service.

name: Angela Studdard
text: Very professional and quality service.

name: Georgia S
text: Always SUPER nice and EXTREMELY helpful!

name: Paris Fuller
text: Melissa was great and very professional! She definitely made my experience memorable.

name: Ken Kobayashi
text: This location is obviously understaffed, to the point where it can't be relied upon to be open during its stated business hours. I've never had this problem with the other FedEx Office location nearby (4711 University Dr).

name: Mila Zsidisin
text: This is a very nice place to ship! Alice and all the staff is great! ALWAYS helpful, attentive, polite.  all who works there are highly qualified specialists. I would highly recommend this office!

name: Anthony Leach
text: Kareem, the manager, got me in and out with no complaints. Thank you for your professionalism.

name: LISA GARCIA
text:
Melissa was so helpful and wonderful helping me print important documents.
Will definitely come back because of her.

name: Word-Xpress LLC
text: Friendly, helpful, and knowledgeable staff! Thank God for them.  All other print service stores  in town drive me nuts!

name: Torey Lavish
text: Melissa did a wonderful job getting me in and out quickly and helping me with a return! This will be my go-to mailing center now.

name: Brittany
text: Came here to ship a package. Great customer service, was in and out in under 3 minutes.

name: Jessica Polk
text: I use this place frequently, and i really enjoy the staff they are very professional.

name: Michelle Bergh
text: Terrible customer service.   Store manager was very rude & condescending to myself & other customers in the store at the time. I was just printing out some papers, was never even acknowledged or offered help. When I did ask for help was treated rudely almost as if I was an annoyance. Will never set foot in this store again.

name: James Burton
text: I've never had to wait here. Great place.

name: Blake Hargrove
text: Friendly staff that took care of me right away.

name: Jeff Peterson
text:
If you're looking for honest service and a helpful staff - GO ELSEWHERE.

After a relative passed away, I packaged and shipped five boxes to our home across the country.  We told the employee that we wanted the most economical option - the contents were valuable and needed insurance (china, books, birdhouse, rug, etc.), but speed was not a concern.  We were told 3 day residential was the cheapest option.

One of the five boxes was completely crushed during shipment and several china pieces were broken despite purchasing nearly $100 of bubble wrap and china specific packaging supplies.  I filed a claim with UPS, provided pictures, etc.  Without inspecting the box, UPS ultimately denied the claim because there was a sweater in the package that I'd sent in the box to free up room for stuff in my luggage.  UPS claimed it was inappropriate packaging material even though it was just part of the contents.  UPS would not discuss the denial with me because UPS deemed the UPS Store as the shipper (not me).

During the claims process, I found out that ground service was available and would have been ~$200 less expensive.

I called the UPS store and spoke to the manager.  I started by telling her about the insurance denial.  She said it was not their issue since they didn't package the box.  I agreed, but told her UPS will only speak with them (as the shipper) and that they needed to act on my behalf to help resolve the issue.  I next mentioned that we could have shipped the boxes via ground for less money and that staff misled us.  She became INCREDIBLY RUDE and told me the staff just recommended that service - not that it wasn't the cheapest option.  I pushed back and asked if she was present at the time of the transaction - she said no.  With no knowledge of the interaction, she continued to blindly and aggressively tell me what her staff said and did.  It was clear the conversation was going nowhere.

A manager from a different location called later.  She said they'd file an appeal with UPS on our behalf.  No followup occurred.

I rarely get fired up, but this experience was AWFUL!  The staff misled and overcharged us.  UPS denied a claim without ever inspecting the box.  UPS would not speak to me despite my family boxing, shipping, paying for and receiving the boxes.  The manager was incredibly rude.  They were unhelpful and failed to help resolve the claim with UPS.

This is a great store if this is the service you're looking for.

To make it even worse, as I was filing the dispute with UPS (which took hours and multiple calls), I contacted the UPS Store to get copies of our receipt.  They were helpful and said they'd send over the receipts.  Instead of sending our receipt, they accidentally emailed me a copy of another customer's DRIVERS LICENSE and SOCIAL SECURITY CARD.  I guess you can add careless to the list too.....

FIND ANOTHER WAY/LOCATION TO SHIP YOUR UPS PACKAGES!

name: Ben Brady
text: rude Cheryl going to fedex

resp.text: Hi, and thank you for visiting our store. We apologize if you had a bad experience in our store. We invite you back to further discuss what happened and to see what actions need to be taken. Maybe there was just a misunderstanding. Please contact us at your earliest convenience.

name: Don Hembree
text: Worst UPS service center experience I’ve ever had. Went in for a simple drop off of a Verizon phone return using the Verizon provided box and shipping label and the owner/attendant  require that I buy a new box from him before shipping. Took to another UPS location and dropped off with no problem.  This is obviously a scam

resp.text: We apologize about your experience in our store. We do invite you back in to better address the situation. Policy states that USPS packaging are for USPS shipping only depending on their service, UPS Express packaging is for UPS Express Services only, and FedEx packaging is for FedEx services only. Thank you!

name: Nicole Smith
text: Went in to this location today at 5:30pm because I needed to give my fingerprints for some documents, when I went in a blonde haired lady with her hair pulled in a high bun who wore glasses  asked what I needed and I told her I needed to give my fingerprints, she then proceeded to tell me they quit doing prints at 5 which is not a big deal I would have came back tomorrow, I was curious as to why they quit taking fingerprints at 5 so I asked the lady, she then said “because we do!” I thought I misinterpreted what she said so I said “I’m sorry did you say because we do” her reply was yup. I asked the lady to speak to a manager she said there wasn’t one there so I asked her name and she stated Cheryl. I was in such shock that she was that rude, I will be contacting management or higher up in the morning! That is just no way to treat customers and is highly upsetting that someone who works with the public doesn’t know how to deal with the public. Terrible customer service!!!!!

resp.text: We do apologize for the way our employee has treated you on your last visit. The real reason we stop doing fingerprints after 5pm is because we try to have two or more employees on the floor, one to assist our fingerprint customers when they come in and one to handle other customers with their needs. We do invite you to come back in to talk with us about redeeming this experience. Thank you!

name: Scotty Stimpson
text: I come to this location all the time to return my Amazon orders. The staff is always professional and the returns go smoothly! Will continue coming!

resp.text: Thank you for your continued patronage!

name: That One No one
text: Best of all in the area!!!

resp.text: Thank you for this review!!!

name: RFG
text: Went to get some documents notarized, staff were prompt, patient, helpful and polite. Great service.

resp.text: Thank you for your visit! We look forward to seeing you again.

name: Anna Ryan
text: Had a package returned with broken items and items missing. Everything left in the package was dirty and in bad condition. The employee was unwilling to do anything about it because I "packaged the box myself." Can't believe they would treat costumers' packages so poorly and offer nothing to fix the problem. Waste of money and time to use this store.

name: John Roberson
text: Great service!

name: Martin Jaramillo
text: I have no reason not to give less tan five stars, it has been as expected every time I've been there.

name: Taylor Allen
text: Horrible customer service. Never going here again. The "manager" was rude and tried to make me feel incompetent. She was condescending and really didn't care to help me. Only concerned with hurrying me out the door to "assist" the next customer. The other woman was nice and pleasant though.

name: AWAKEN Student Ministries
text: Great Customer service, always friendly and willing to Go the extra mile!!!

name: Harmony Love
text:
The African American manager was very rude and unfriendly to his employees and to the customers!

I return packages all the time to Amazon and I never pay a dime.

This representative made me pay $12 for PACKAGING!!!

resp.text:
I would first like to apologize if I came off abrasive or seemed short with anyone. That was not my intention. There were several factors at play and maybe my directness was not well received.
Unfortunately, your Amazon return was not covered for The UPS Store to pack and ship. Yes, Amazon covered your shipping, but they did not cover your packaging. Not all Amazon returns are free returns. Not all Amazon returns are covered for The UPS Store to pack and ship. A shipping label only covers shipping costs. It does not cover packaging. Also, I did not make you pay for packaging. I said if you wish for us to package your return, then it was going to be $12. I do invite you back to our location for a more personal apology and to possibly review this incident to come to a better understanding.

name: Kelley Anderson
text: I had prompt, friendly, competent service. Sign on the door says under new management; that might explain the poor reviews from earlier.

name: Chase Walley
text: These people are Jerks.  I stood in the store for 10+ minutes before the staff even spoke to me.  I waited my turn and still ended up leaving because of LACK of customer service!   I would not recommend this place to anyone.

name: blake myers
text: Very poor customer service!!!   Ruined a print that my mom mailed to me.   The manager was very rude and never apologized for packing wrong.   I will not use them ever again and I will go to FEDEX for future service.   Poor, Poor Customer Service and I would not recommend them for future service.

name: Jalexia Collins
text: Rude employees!! UPS is the worst delivery service!!

name: Virginia Patterson
text: Service was very fast and easy

name: Lakendra Smith
text: Every time my packages are delivered from this location my packages ALWAYS go the wrong address. They need to make sure these drivers are reading the correct and whole addresses. People would like to actually receive their packages. This only happens with FEDEX. This has happened to me on 4 different occasions. It showed my package was delivered but it’s not where to be found. This is a VERY VERY big inconvenience and poor customer service. I’m sure they don’t send their packages to someone else’s house. If I could chose what mail carriers could deliver my mail it SURE WOULDN’T be FEDEX not this location anyway. DEFINITELY DISAPPOINTED!!!!!!

name: Nikki Wilcox
text:
Looking for a good lawyer to represent all the customers that this place has stolen packages from.
Please help!

name: Michelle Wood-Capolino
text: Too often I have to chase down my deliveries. They don't even get it to the right street or building,  let alone apartment.  And trying to contact the local hubs is next to impossible.

name: Mark Winslow
text: out in the middle of no-where but they were very helpful

name: Steven Dyess
text:
Any package that goes to the Eastaboga, AL office is likely to be lost forever. I placed an order with a well known retailer 3 weeks ago and the driver left it at a house in different zip code. The retailer sent it a second time and I just got a notice that the delivery failed because no one was at home. I've been here all day, so he either went to the wrong house again or just lied about it. Calling FedEx will get you someone in India who can do nothing but write a report.

FedEx stands all alone as the worst company on earth.

name: Richard Mannick
text: I can't believe that a business like this only has one scanner and it's broke HOW do you run a business?????? Then I call customer service and they send me to places like Dollar General and they don't know nothing. But when you get send all over town by the service they provide and you can't even get a label printed and ship a package something is really WRONG. Don't know Want be doing business with FEDEX ANY MORE.

name: Heimdall's Gate
text: Great service for everyone else except me ... Unfortunately I went to the wrong store.

name: Anitra Davis
text: Waited 45 minutes during regular business hours to ship a package... made it all the way home n. They finally answered n said they was open but locked the doors bc a staff member had to leave. Went back still had to go to a different location the lady upfront didn’t know how to work the scanner to give back a receipt 9/22/20

name: Trevor Grubbs
text: This place is the worst! Package sat on a truck to be delivered for (5) days! No delivery date could be confirmed.  Got fed up and ordered from another company that doesn't ship with FedEx, of course! This Eastaboga location seems to be incompetent and the 1 800 # is no help. Done with FedEx!

name: Hunter Webster
text: Poor customer service from the lady in the front VERY RUDE. Will start using another location or ups.

name: elaine garduno
text: Waited twenty mins in the front no one came out

name: Christine Wilson
text: Delivery driver left my package 2 doors down from me today. Drivers from this location have been here several times so I don't understand why they left it at someone else's home. There is a sign on top of the mailbox with the address number on it. If I hadn't been watching for it I wouldn't have gotten my package.

name: Gene Peppers
text: I want my packages that are disappearing!!! I’m going to report you to the police for THEFT

name: Johnny Carmicheal
text: I thought the store was well ran and very friendly I would recommend it to anyone.

name: Deidra Milliner
text: Customer service rep.

name: Little Big Truths
text: Place is as scammy as they come! One of our packages has been delivered to wrong address and one of our neighbors brought it over. Second time, the driver scanned the product as delivered, but it never made it to our place. Basically, the driver either delivered it to the worn house again or flat out stile it. I’d wager it was stolen. We filed complaints, but nothing was investigated or reimbursed to us. Here’s reason why I’m inclined to believe that our second package was stolen - we forced them to deliver correctly was when we included a request to have package released under signature upon delivery. So driver knows where our place is and where to deliver... Now every time we order anything shipped, we specifically request NOT to ship items with FedEx...

name: Andrew Dunscombe
text: Friendly and helpful experience

name: David Anderson
text: They lied about attempting to deliver. I was sitting at home when I got a “missed you” text

name: Carmen C Yates
text: I’ve had two Fedex packages delivered this week. BOTH ladies were excellent! I didn’t get the first lady’s name, but the second was Tria Sellers. Thank you for taking great care of my packages & making sure I received them!

name: TJ Redrock
text: I can see why all the negative reviews. I had package scheduled to be delivered to our office and everything was on time until I got a delivery exception notification. It claimed that our business was close, which was not the case. We are under construction, but have very, very clear signs on directing traffic. Giving the benefit of the doubt, I called Fedex to let them know I need that pack THE DAY IT WAS SCHEDULED and that THEIR DRIVER is the one that failed to read clearly marked signs on where to deliver it. Neither UPS or USPS and any issues delivering. They sent the local hub the message that we needed the package that day. I scheduled this 15 mins after I got the delivery exception. The driver couldn't have been very far away at this time. After 5 o'clock I called again and basically said that they were not delivering it and that I could not pick it up until the next day. If I needed it the next day, that's when I would have scheduled the delivery. FedEx basically told me they don't care that it was their fault my package wasn't in my hand and they weren't going to do anything about it. Talk about great customer service. If you can, stick with UPS or even USPS if you want your package on time.

name: Lindy Alverson
text: If I could give no stars, I would. My package has been at the facility since Wednesday and it is now Saturday night. Everyday I receive an email in the morning that my package is out for delivery and every evening I receive an email that no delivery was attempted. I tried to call and the customer rep hung up on me. Horrible place!

name: M.D. Harrell
text: I missed a delivery and then drove 45 mins to this FedEx facility so that I could pick-up my package.  The facilities customer service operations stop at 6pm, but the driver wasn't going to be back until after 6.  The gentleman working the customer service center offered for me to wait in my vehicle until the driver returned and then he would come get me.  I received my package at about 6:15 and was able to head home very satisfied.

name: Tim Flood
text: HAL package quickly staged upon my arrival, great security and communications. Fantastic experience.

name: Sandra Simpson
text: as far as  the people  or drives r really nice  that bring you orders  to your house  i would gave them a `10 . now the man in my area for pick up  a 000 he will tell you go to the area where there is a store for you to drop it  and he will pick it up there

name: Vicky Li
text: Horrible! I was waiting all day for my package by my door! Didn’t even come by and said “delivery exception”. The truck did not even come to my house yet they flat out lie and say I was not home when I obviously was!! They are the worst!!!

name: Matthew Sweeney
text: FedEx is probably the worst shipping company in the world. If dudes in India can hand-deliver millions of lunches every day without getting anything wrong, a US company could at least have a functional website or a delivery schedule that accounts for people who work for a living.

name: Kim Fisher
text: Always polite when I go to drop off my packages.

name: RMOONDOGGY
text: Come to the door, already have their hang-tag filled out, tap once and high-tail to the truck and leave. Supposedly they will deliver on Saturday but will not even if the package was shipped with Saturday Delivery paid for....... Always the same...NEVER deliver on time.

name: Justlala Purkey
text: Fed X 800 number is no help. You can't get in touch with the local office to ask a SIMPLE QUESTION. This is not really good business.  Can't say anything about the local office as I could not speak to anyone there.

name: Vicky Caldwell
text: Good price and service

name: Melissa Moore
text: If I could go lower than a 1, I definitely would! I have never had an accurate delivery come from this facility. It's like their drivers can't follow simple instructions. I mean, why would you try and deliver a sign for package outside of the specific instructions saying what times someone will be available to sign

name: Billy Voluntarist Burger
text: Next day delivery. Yeah right! Got jacked around. My account has had specific instructions to leave all packages on front porch if no one is home. Called customer service several times. I got several different stories from several different people as to why package was not left. I was told I could drive 50 miles to pickup at the ship center on Saturday or wait until Monday for re-delivery. Then I was told that the shipper could request Saturday delivery. I conference the the shipper and Fed-ex and shipper provided account number for Saturday delivery. After being on the phone and talking to 4-5 diffrent people over a 2 hour period, I finally was told by a supervisor that the fed-ex ship center where my package was being held, was not even open on Saturday.REALLY? So due to thier incompetence not only will I not get my "next day package" on time, but when I do finally get the shipment, it will be useless to me. I guess I'm lucky I called back enough times to finally figure out that the ship-center was not open Saturdays, before I made a 100 mile round trip for nothing. Do not use Fed-ex if you need to get your packages delivered on-time. They cannot follow shipping instructions and are incompetent.

name: Zack Robertson
text: Sat at home ALL DAY waiting for a delivery that would be here "before 8 PM". Walk outside to get something out of my truck and notice a tag hanging on the door. The driver didn't even attempt to ring the door bell or knock to where I could hear the door, and I only missed the delivery by 2 minutes. Tried to get in touch with someone from this facility to find out where the driver was, because I knew he had to be in my vicinity, only to be directed to some call center overseas where they didn't have any helpful information. If I could give zero stars, I would. Piss poor performance from this location.

name: Christian Smith
text: Worst delivery I ever had ordered a car part I need for my only vehicle it was supposed to be delivered on the 11th they rescheduled it to the 15th and on the 15th I get a delivery’s exception for inspection worst company by far!!

name: Siomara Lopez
text:
wish I could give them a 0
Waiting on a delivery for days, I even took a day off work to wait...when I checked online later that day, they had updated it saying they couldn't deliver because I wasn't home.. really bad service

name: Ken Davenport
text:
Several times on critical overnight or next day packages have not received them on time. Have received them as promised about half the time.  This FedEx location has terrible logistics. That is complicated by the fact that you cannot contact that place directly. So everytime I call I get someone in a central location who tells me that the bozo has "put it on the wrong van". So I had to cancel plans twice to stay in town to get the packages. Will not use FedEx again. Unfortunately the shipper use FedEx. They have not arrived at the same conclusion I have yet but they will with time

Update 3months later....ok so since then I've had 4 more packages shipped with Fed Sux. One an expensive cello...arrived as promised. The other 3 ...DAYS late! It's unbelievable!!! UPS is killing FedSux. I get daily deliveries from UPS and you can bet your first born it will be delivered on the day it's promised

name: Angela Herring
text: Horrible customer service!.  My mom waited at my house ALL DAY for a package that they delivered around 6:00.  I was there just before 6:00 and never saw them.  I wonder if they even knocked!  Use UPS instead!

name: Maria Newbold
text: I had to drive about 30 min drive from my home to Eastabogo fedx location. My husband and I got there a little bit before 6pm (closing) time. We were surprised that the doors were lock because it was not 6pm. My husband knock on the door because the office inside light was on. I called the 800 number to see why the location closed early. The first customer service representative assistant that the location did not have a number. I hung up the phone and called again; the next customer rep was nice and she contact the location to see why the doors were closed before 6pm. Customer service rep stated that Jenny said that she was assisting another customer and she lock the door at 6pm. While i was on the phone with the customer rep the lady, Jenny, came to the door. She open the door half way and got my recipt and allowed me to come in the building. She stated to me that she lock the door at 6pm..i told her she didnt while still on the phone with fedx customer rep...the lady Jenny handed me back my reciept and told me I can get my package tommorrow. Customer service suck and that lady need to be fired.

name: Marcus Davinport
text: Scanned bussiness closed at 630am.  Did not try to redeliver .   ........    still waiting on call back 2 plus weeks.

name: Isabela Venegas
text: This place is horrible  because this is horrible service.
